11232.content: How will Cream grow into a GTS?
11232.title: Cream

choices: Tails tests the machine on an inanimate object
112321.content:
It was just another regular day in the lab for our favorite twin-tailed supergenius. Tails was busy at work with a brand new project that he hoped would revolutionize the world and bring an end to one of the world’s greatest problems.

He had a welding mask as he took a soldering iron to the circuits of his newest invention, the flame carefully bringing together the necessary connections to make the device function.

He took a moment to stop and wipe the sweat from his brow, he’d been working all morning on this project since Sonic hadn’t been around lately to keep him company.

He usually only took on these projects when Sonic was absent for an extended period of time, and his imagination tended to drive him to do these sorts of things when he wasn’t around.

“HEY TAILS!”

Of course, there was always that chance he could arrive out of nowhere.

“Sonic!” The fox boy shouted in annoyance. “Haven’t you ever heard of knocking?! You almost made me burn my fur off!”

Sonic rubbed underneath his nose and chuckled a bit. “Sorry little buddy, didn’t mean to scare ya.” He walked over to the fox boy and leaned over him to see. “Whatcha workin’ on?”

Tails smiled in response to that. He always did enjoy talking about his inventions. “It’s my newest project. If it works I could potentially solve world hunger once and for all!”

“Hey that’s great!” Sonic exclaimed before blinking blankly. “So, what’s it supposed to do?”

Tails was about to reply when he heard a knock on the door. “Huh? Who could that be?” Wiping his hands with a somewhat dirty rag, Tails walked over to the door and looked through the peephole. “Huh, didn’t expect them.”

“Who’s ‘them’?” Sonic raised an eyebrow.

Tails opened the door and smirked as he watched Sonic’s eyes grow comically wide in horror.

“AMY?!”

“Well hello there Sonic, fancy meeting you here.” Amy sauntered over to the blue hedgehog who was backing up as she came forward. “Aren’t you glad to see me?”

“Uh yeah, yeah. Nice to see you Ames.” Sonic gulped.

“So what brings you here Amy?” Tails nodded in acknowledgement of his other guest, Cream, and smiled down at her.

“Well, I just happened to be in the neighborhood, and I was thinking we could all take a group trip to Twinkle Park.” She batted her eyelashes at the flustered blue hedgehog. “You know, their cute couples get in free promotion is still active.”

Sonic gulped again and continued to back away. “Sorry Ames, but I was just leaving. Later gang!” Sonic took off like a shot, with Amy trailing behind him crying out to him.

“Come on Sonic! It’ll be fun! SONIC!”

Tails shook his head and chuckled a bit. “Ahh Sonic, you’ll figure it out eventually.” He then turned to his other guest and smiled down at her. “So what can I do for you Cream?”

The young rabbit was standing there with her pet chao, Cheese, hovering closeby. “Well, I came with Amy to see if you and Mr. Sonic wanted to come to Twinkle Park with us, but apparently he doesn’t want to.”

“Yeah, looks that way.” Tails sighed, “Sorry you came all this way for nothing.”

Cream tilted her head to the side. “It’s not for nothing. You’re my friend too! I like being with you.”

Somehow, Tails felt his cheeks grow warm at that. “Heh, thanks.” He put his mask back on to hide his blush and went over to continue working.

Cream walked over to the fox boy and rocked back and forth on her heels as she watched him prepare to work. “What are you working on?” She asked innocently.

Tails turned around and took his mask off, grinning widely. “Well I was gonna tell Sonic before he ran off, but I can tell you.” He got up and gestured dramatically towards his device. “Cream, may I present to you…the Growinator!“
112321.title: Introducing the Growinator

choices: Cream and Cheese both begin to grow
1123211.content:
“The Growinator?”

Tails bravado soon deflated at Cream’s innocent sounding question, and he slumped with a dejected sigh as he scratched the back of his head. “Yeah, I know…the name is a work in progress.”

Cream couldn’t help but giggle at that. “So what does it do?”

Tails smiled. “Why don’t I show you?” The fox closed up the device and stood up, taking hold of it and aiming it like a pistol. “You see that apple over there on that stand?”

Cream looked over to where Tails was pointing and nodded, “Yes I see it…it looks really small.”

“That’s because it is.” Tails replied. “But if this functions the way I want it to, it won’t be small for long.” Tails grinned and pressed a button on a nearby computer console. “Project: ‘Large Appetite’ test one. Recording.”

“Should I stand back?” Cream asked.

Tails nodded. “That would probably be a good idea.” He turned a knob on the side of the gun and aimed at the apple. “Growinator fire!” The moment the fox boy pulled the trigger, green waves of energy began bombarding the apple until it began to somehow fluctuate. “I think it’s working!”

“Really?!” Cream clasped her hands in excitement for her friend’s success.

“Yeah!” Tails nodded excitedly. He kept squeezing the trigger, and suddenly the apple seemed to shift somehow, and again, and again. “It’s growing! It works!” Tails let go of the trigger and the waves stopped, but not before the apple made one more shift and finally stopped. “I did it!”

“Amazing Tails! The apple looks so much bigger now!” Cream exclaimed.

Tails went over and carefully examined the apple, it had indeed increased in size substantially, so much so that Cheese, who had been curiously watching from a safe distance, was now the same size as the apple that he had previously been twice its size.

“It doubled in size! This is better than I could’ve hoped for!” Tails cheered. “Cream, do you know what this means?!” Cream didn’t get a chance to reply, as Tails continued to rave about his success. “With my growth ray fully functional, I could end world hunger once and for all by increasing the density and mass of all sorts of foods!”

Tails ran over and grabbed Cream’s hands, spinning around with her in joy. “Children in third-world countries will never have to go hungry again! I’ll make their food so big that they’ll have problems finding a place to put their leftovers!” Tails grinned madly. “I smell a Nobel prize in my future.”

“What’s a Nobel prize?” Cream tilted her head curiously, smiling as she took note of Cheese taking a bite out of the apple.

“Oh.” Tails chuckled as he realized he’d gone off on a tangent and rubbed the back of his head sheepishly. “It’s an award given to people who discover something amazing for science. That’s the most general description.” Tails snapped his fingers in realization. “Oh! I gotta write down the results in my journal! Be right back!” Tails ran over to his computer and sat down in his chair as he began typing at lightning speed.

Meanwhile, Cream had gone over to Cheese, who was still happily munching on the apple. “Does it taste good Cheese?”

“Cheese stuck his head out from the giant apple and smiled. "Chao chao!”

The rabbit giggled. “I’m so happy for Tails, his invention will make so many people happy! No one will ever be hungry again!” At the mention of hunger, the rabbit girl’s stomach rumbled a bit. “Oops.” She blushed. “Guess I’m a little hungry myself!”

“Chao chao chao!” Cheese pushed the apple towards her, and the young girl smiled in response.

“Thank you Cheese, it looks delicious!” Cream needed two hands to hold the apple, but once she got a hold of it, she took a big bite out of it and started chewing. “Mmm, it is delicious!” She swallowed and giggled. “Nice to know making it grow didn’t make it taste different!”

“And…done.” Tails closed his online journal and turned around in his chair. “Ok Cream, next we have to…” Tails eyes widened in horror as he watched Cream and Cheese blissfully eat away at the apple. “Cream, Cheese, no!”

The two jumped at the sudden urgency in Tails voice, and they put the giant apple back on the stand and frowned. “What’s the matter Tails?”

I wasn’t finished testing it!“ He exclaimed with his head between his palms in fear. "I have no idea what might happen if someone actually EATS a food that’s been enlarged!”

Cream and Cheese looked at each nervously before folding their hands in front of them in regret. “We’re sorry.”

Tails gulped. “Oh boy…” He said to himself. “This could be a problem…a really BIG problem.”
1123211.title: Tails the humanitarian

choices: Morning comes - Cream still feels the same
Cream grows in her sleep, the apple didn't affect Cheese
11232112.content:
Tails ran over to the apple with a scanner in hand, and he began scanning it over and over, whispering to himself nervously. “Please no side effects, please no side effects…”

“Tails, what’s gonna happen to me and Cheese?” Cream asked with a nervous expression.

“Chao chao!” Cheese concurred.

Tails stopped scanning and ran his hand through the fur on his head. “According to my initial scans, the only thing that has been modified is the mass and density of the apple from the molecular level, there doesn’t appear to be any excess radiation emanating from when I bombarded the apple with the enlargement rays.”

“Huh?” Cream tilted her head.

“Sorry.” Tails sighed. “There doesn’t seem to be any side effects…it’s just…bigger.”

“Are Cheese and I gonna get bigger because we ate it?” Cream looked over at Cheese who returned her anxious expression.

“That’s the problem. I was excited because the ray completed its purpose, but I wasn’t finished with my tests. I needed to know what the possible ramifications were should someone try to eat that apple. I planned on testing it on insects by having them eat pieces of the apple and observing them overnight. If there was any increase in size, that would indicate that the apple wasn’t fit for Mobian consumption.”

Cream tilted her head again. “Tails, you use a lot of big words.”

Tails shook his head in worried frustration. “Sorry…when I’m nervous my vocabulary goes nuts.” Tails took a deep breath. “If the bugs I made eat the apple got bigger, then the apple wouldn’t be safe to eat. But now…you and Cheese are the apple instead. I honestly don’t know what will happen.”

“Is there anything we should do Tails?” Cream asked.

After pacing back and forth for a few moments, Tails walked over to Cream and grabbed her hands, looking her dead in the eyes. “Listen to me very carefully Cream, this is extremely important. Everything I tell you to do, you need to make sure you do it.”

Cream nodded, Cheese nodding too. “Ok Tails.”

“I want you to go home, and I want you to act like nothing happened. Then later, before you go to bed, I want you to ask your mom to measure both you and Cheese to see if you’ve grown at all.”

Cream nodded. “Ok.”

“Then, I want you to go to sleep, and in the morning, ask your mom to measure you and Cheese again. She may not do it right away because she measured already, but find a way to convince her. We need to make sure that if you apparently grew the first time, it’s not just a result of your normal growth because you’re young.”

“Because I might be getting bigger by myself?” Cream asked.

The fox boy nodded. “Right. You’re growing already because you’re young, I’m growing too. But we’re supposed to grow slowly. So if you grow the first time and not the second time, everything should be ok…but if you grow both times…I may have to look into reversing polarity on the Growinator.”

“And make it a Shrinkinator?” Cream giggled.

Tails rolled his eyes and laughed despite the situation. “Note to self, change the name.” Tails then got serious again. “So you understand what you have to do right?”

“Yes I do.” Cream nodded vigorously, her ears bouncing behind her head. “I’ll go right now, Mommy wanted me to go back home if we didn’t go to Twinkle Park.”

“Ok…I’ll see what I can do here. See you tomorrow Cream.” Tails watched the two go, and sighed to himself as his anxiety grew. “Let’s my hope my anxiety is the only thing that grows.”

That night, after Vanilla served dimmer and Cream got washed up for bed, the rabbit girl walked up to her mother with a shy expression. “Here we go Cheese.” She whispered before speaking louder. “Mommy?”

Vanilla looked up from the book she was reading. “What is it Cream dear?”

“Could you…measure me and Cheese please? I want to see if we’ve gotten any bigger since since last time.” She asked as innocently as she could.

Vanilla looked at her pleading daughter curiously for a moment. “Well, it’s been a month since the last time.” She got up from her chair, “But after this you go right to bed ok? It’s past your bedtime.”

“Thank you Mommy!” Both Cream and Cheese hurried over to the kitchen where the doorframe had several marks on it. Vanilla had been measuring Cream ever since the girl was 2 years old, and Cream looked in awe for a moment at how low the bottom mark was. “I used to be so small…I’ve gotten a lot bigger since Mommy started measuring me.”

“Chao chao chao.” Cheese looked at his own measurements that were on the other side of the doorframe, but his measurements weren’t as noticeable as Cream’s.

Vanilla came with a pencil and had them both stand up tall against the doorframe. “Let’s see…this time it’s Cheese’s turn to be measured first.”

“Chao!” Cheese stopped fluttering and landed on the ground, and Vanilla made the mark, paying careful mind of the little ball that that signified the Chao’s emotions. “Chao chao.”

“No Cheese, I’m afraid you haven’t grown any bigger since last time.” Vanilla said sympathetically.

“Chao.” He wiped his forehead.

Vanilla was a bit confused by Cheese’s strange relief, but shook it off as nothing and went over to her daughter. “Stand up tall please.”

“Cream put her shoulders back and straightened her spine. "Like this?”

Vanilla smiled. “Just like that.” She was about to make the measurement when she noticed the mischievous grin on Cream’s face. “No tiptoes dear.” She smirked.

“Aww.” Cream giggled and obeyed.

Vanilla carefully made the mark and gave a motherly smile when she was finished. “You can turn around now Cream.”

Cream slowly turned around, and her eyes widened a bit when she saw where the mark was. It was ever so slightly higher than the last one. “Wow!”

Vanilla chuckled and embraced her daughter. “You’re growing so fast Cream. I remember when you were tiny and you fit in just one of my arms.”

“I’m gonna be a big girl, huh Mommy?” Cream pulled back and asked with a smile.

“Well, it will certainly help if you hurry off to bed. Growing girls need their sleep so they can grow more after all!” Vanilla gently gave the little girl a nudge to get her moving, and she watched as Cream and Cheese raced up the stairs to their room. “How time flies.”

Cream closed the door as soon as she got into her room and let out a breath she’d been holding. “Well Cheese, it looks like I got bigger…now tomorrow we have to make Mommy measure us again.”

“Chao chao, chao chao chao?”

“I don’t know why you didn’t grow, maybe that means the apple didn’t do anything to us and it’s like Tails said, I grew naturally.”

“Chao chao chao.”

“Guess we’ll just have to see.” Cream crawled into bed and pulled the covers up over herself, yawning as she settled into bed, with Cheese doing the same in his own tiny bed nearby. “Goodnight Cheese.”

“Chao chao.”
11232112.title: It's only natural

choices: Cream is still the same size as before
Cream is even bigger than ever!
112321121.content:
The next morning, Cream woke up after having some rather interesting dreams. “Did I grow again?” She got up out of bed and looked at herself in the mirror. “Maybe it’s not enough to notice a difference.” She rushed over and woke up Cheese, who for a moment had a swirl over his head as he wasn’t happy about being woken. “Cheese, it’s morning! We gotta check if we got any bigger!”

That woke the Chao up quickly, and he flew out of bed and followed Cream downstairs, where Vanilla was just finishing putting breakfast on the table. “Chao chao chao chao?”

“I don’t know how I’ll get her to measure us Cheese…but we gotta try something.” Taking a deep breath, Cream walked into the kitchen while her mother’s back was turned to the sink. “Good morning Mommy.”

Vanilla turned around and smiled. “Oh, good morning Cream, good morning Cheese. I was just about to wake you, breakfast is ready.”

“Thank you Mommy.” Cream’s smile faltered as she thought about what to do next. But Vanilla noticed.

“Is something the matter sweetheart?” Vanilla asked worriedly.

“Oh no! Nothing is wrong Mommy! She exclaimed assuredly. "But…I was just wondering…”

“What is it?”

“Could you measure us again? Please?” She said with her hands clasped together.

“Chao chao chao?” Cheese repeated the motion.

Vanilla frowned a bit. “Dear I measured you just last night, I’m afraid growing doesn’t work that way.”

“I know Mommy…but…” Cream’s eyes widened in realization. “See, I had a dream last night.”

“A dream?” Vanilla asked curiously. “About what?”

“Well…see, I grew a whole lot in the dream Mommy, Cheese too! And we were walking around Station Square helping people who were smaller than us! But then we got even bigger! And I started to get scared! I thought maybe the dream meant I grew again!”

“Hmm.” Vanilla gave a small smile. “Alright dear, I’ll measure you two again, if that’ll make you feel better.”

“Thank you Mommy!” Cream rushed over to the kitchen doorframe again and stood up straight. “Do Cheese first!” She exclaimed.

“Alright, just calm down.” Vanilla said soothingly as she knelt down to measure the Chao. “Cheese is still the same size as before.” She then turned to measure her daughter. “And as for you Cream…”

“Yes?” Cream squeaked.
112321121.title: Morning comes - Cream still feels the same

choices: Cream decides to use the Growinator on herself
Tails sees that Cream is disappointed
1123211211.content:
“You are also the same size as before.” Vanilla smiled consolingly and rubbed her daughter’s cheek. “See? No need to be afraid darling.” She kissed Cream’s forehead and stood up. “Now then, time for breakfast. I made pancakes!”

“Chao chao chao!” Cheese cheered and flew into the kitchen, leaving Cream alone for the moment.

Cream stood there looking at the marking her mother had just drawn over. She didn’t grow overnight, the apple she ate at Tails’ lab hadn’t done anything to her…so that left her wondering…why did she somehow feel disappointed about that?

After eating her breakfast, Cream informed her mother that she was going to go visit Tails at his lab, and Vanilla made sure to let her know to be safe. Once outside, Cream started flapping her ears and took off flying with Cheese flying beside her. “Well, guess we better go tell Tails what happened.”

“Chao chao chao, chao chao?”

“I’m ok Cheese…but, can I tell you something?”

Cheese nodded. “Chao chao.”

“I don’t know why…but I think part of me was hoping the apple made us grow after all…sometimes it’s no fun being the smallest of our friends.”

“Chao chao chao.”

“Yeah, I know…I DID say only PART of me was hoping we grew. The other part is really happy that we’re not in any danger.” Cream smiled. “Thank you Cheese.”

“Chao chao!”

“Come on! Let’s go tell Tails so we can tell him his Growinator worked perfectly and he can get his Nobel prize!” The two raced through the air and in no time they were landing in front of the fox’s lab, and as soon as they did, the door opened and revealed a very agitated looking Tails. “Um…hi Tails.”

“What happened? Is everything ok?” he asked hastily.

“Yes I think so.” Cream replied. “May we come in please?”

“Huh?” Tails blinked a couple moments before shaking his head. “Sure, sure. Sorry about that. Come in.” He gestured for the two to enter, and the rabbit and Chao did just that. Once they were inside, Tails closed the door and walked over to them. “So what happened?”

“Well…Mommy measured us last night, and I’m a little bigger than I was last month. Cheese isn’t though.”

“Ok…” Tails nodded to try and encourage Cream to continue.

“And then when I woke up this morning, I got her to measure us again before breakfast…and I’m not any bigger than I was last night.”

Tails sighed in relief and even gave a little laugh. “Thank goodness. I was so worried that you and Cheese would grow out of control or something. Looks like the first test is a success, although let’s try to avoid using ourselves as guinea pigs next time, ok?”

Cream smiled faintly. “Ok.” She said quietly.
1123211211.title: In the clear...unfortunately

choices: Success - Cream is a little bigger
Something goes wrong, Tails can't stop her from growing!
11232112112.content:
Tails went to his computer and typed in the results of the test, and when he turned back around, he saw Cream’s back was turned to him, and she seemed to be staring intently at something. “Cream?” When he didn’t get an answer, he walked over to her and looked at where she was staring…she was staring right in the direction of where the Growinator was sitting on a workbench. “Cream…are you…upset…that the experiment was successful?” He asked incredulously.

Cream blinked and looked up at Tails. “Huh? Oh!” She blushed in embarrassment as she realized she’d been caught staring at the invention. “No Tails! I’m happy that your Growinator worked! But…” she looked away and blushed deeper.

“You…WANTED the apple to make you grow…didn’t you?” The fox boy asked in shock.

“A little.” Cream squeaked almost inaudibly. Her embarrassment was at its peak now.

Tails said nothing for a few moments, then his eyes landed on Cheese who had picked up a screwdriver and was looking it over curiously. “Does Cheese feel the same way?” He asked gently. Cream just shook her head. Not wanting to answer verbally. “I see.” Tails took a few steps away and scratched his chin in thought for a few moments. Then his eyes landed on his invention, then on the dejected rabbit, and back onto the invention again. “You know…” he said somewhat hesitantly. “There ARE other applications for the Growinator besides enlarging food…I also theorize it could be used on PEOPLE.”

Cream looked up with her eyes wide in shock. “Really?”

Tails blushed a bit and nodded. “Yeah. Of course, it’s only a theory until I get a chance to…test it.”

The rabbit girl’s eyes began to sparkle. “Are you saying what I think you’re saying?!”

“Maybe…” Tails replied nervously. “Before I do anything though,” he walked up to her and looked down at her. “Tell me…why were you hoping the apple would make you bigger?”

Cream blushed again and looked away. “Because…being the smallest makes me feel sometimes that I can’t do anything. You’re all bigger and stronger than me, you always have to protect me when Dr. Eggman attacks!” Cream looked into Tails’ eyes with her own shimmering with unshed tears. “I want to be able to help you and the others! I don’t want to need protection when danger is around just because I’m the smallest!”

“Cream you KNOW that’s not true!” He grabbed her hand and squeezed it. “You’re not useless, you’ve done a lot to help us since we became friends. I mean, you’re the one who taught Emerl when HE was with us that sometimes NOT fighting is just as important as fighting.”

Cream began to cry. “But he was almost destroyed when I refused to help him fight! And even when I DID help, if Cheese hadn’t been there I wouldn’t have been able to do ANYTHING!”

Tails had no real response to that. What she was saying wasn’t inaccurate. “Cream…you’re not useless. You AREN’T.” he stressed with a squeeze of her hand.

She looked down at their hands for a moment and used her free one to wipe her tears. “Maybe not…” she admitted. “But I wanna be able to do more.” She looked back up into his baby blue eyes. “I had a dream last night Tails. I dreamed that I was BIG! And I was able to help all sorts of people because I was big! I want to grow and help people!”

Tails sighed heavily and rubbed the back of his neck before locking eyes with her again. “Ok Cream…it’s against my better judgment…but I’ll try and make you a LITTLE BIT bigger. Not too much. You understand?”

That was all she needed to hear. “THANK YOU TAILS!” She squealed and lunged forward, wrapping the fox boy into a hug that made him turn beet red. “You’ve made me so happy Tails. Thank you thank you thank you!”

“Heh heh, ok.” Tails got her to let go and smiled down at her. “Get over to where the apple used to be, and I’ll make you grow.”

With an excited squeak, Cream rushed over and stood in front of the device, jumping up and down for joy as the anticipation overcame her. “Hurry Tails!”

“I feel like I’m gonna regret this.” Tails grumbled to himself as he pressed a button on the console. “Project: ‘Growth Spurt’, test one initiating.” He then walked over to a nearby wall and rolled over a portable measuring wall. “This measures things in feet and inches, so now I’m gonna measure you and see how big you are so we have a point of reference.”

“Ok!” Cream stood against the wall and tried to make herself as tall as possible for her measurement, minus the tiptoes that she used last night. “Should I take off my shoes?”

“Yes.” Cream obliged and placed her shoes neatly over by the front door before smiling at him and returning to her position. “Heh.” Tails chuckled in amusement. “Even when she’s super excited she stays polite.” He said to himself. He measured her and made a note in a nearby notebook which he took over with him to the Growinator pistol. “Your current height is 2 feet, 4 inches tall…I’m going to activate the Growinator at its lowest setting…I don’t want you blowing the roof off my lab.”

“Whatever you say Tails…I’m ready to be big!” She exclaimed.

Tails sighed and powered up the gun. “Ok…activating Growinator…now!” He pulled the trigger, and weak, green waves of energy hovered over to the little rabbit, who closed her eyes when the waves hit her. “Are you ok?!”

“Uh huh.” Cream nodded, “It feels warm. Like Mommy’s hugs!”

“I’ll make a note of that.” Tails mumbled to himself. After a few more moments, nothing had happened yet. “I wonder if it’s not working.” He said quietly enough so Cream wouldn’t hear him. He was just about to give up when he heard Cream give a surprised squeak. “What’s the matter?!”

“I felt something…it felt like I stretched or something!”

Tails went over to his console while still holding the trigger, and despite the previous success of the ray, he couldn’t help but be surprised. “You did.”

“Really?! Oh!” Cream felt the sensation again, and then again, and then again. Finally after about five more times, Cream looked around and a huge grin spread across her face. “It’s working! I’m GROWING!”
11232112112.title: Tails sees that Cream is disappointed

choices: Cream has to fly to reach the spot she wants to grow to
Cream wants to be enormous, there isn't enough room in the workshop!
112321121121.content:
Cream giggled as she continued to stretch ever so slowly higher, her body enlarging by a tiny margin with each “stretch”. The rabbit giggled and squealed as the waves continued to bombard her, relishing in their warmth as she slowly grew bigger. “I’m getting bigger, I’m going to be big!” But before she knew it, Tails had let go of the trigger, and the rabbit girl frowned as the sensation left her. “Aww, why did you stop?”

Tails tried to give her as stern a look as he could without looking angry. “I said I’d make you a little bit bigger, remember this is meant for science, it’s not a game. The test was successful.”

Cream frowned but eventually nodded in understanding. “I know. I’m sorry Tails, but it was just so amazing!” Cream’s eyes then widened. “Oh yeah! So how big am I now?!”

“Well,” Tails walked over to Cream who suddenly closed her eyes when he approached. “Why’re you closing your eyes?”

“Because I want it to be a surprise!” She exclaimed.

“Ok.” Tails rolled his eyes and measured the girl, and to his shock, he found that Cream had grown substantially. “You’re now 2 feet 7 inches…you’re…as big as I am now.”

“Really?!” Cream opened her eyes and saw that she could now easily look Tails right in the eyes, no longer needing to look up at him. “I really DID grow! I grew 3 whole inches!”

“Yes you did.” Tails turned around and walked away with a thoughtful expression. “Of course, this brings up some rather troublesome implications…such as how your mother will react when she sees that not only have YOU grown, but your clothing has too. She’s gonna KNOW something isn’t right.”

“Oh…” Cream frowned and scuffed the floor with her shoe. “I didn’t think about that.” She sighed and looked at Tails with a sad face. “Does this mean I’m going to have to shrink back down? I was just starting to enjoy being bigger.”

“It’s gonna take me some time before I can reverse polarity on the ray. So until I do that, you’re gonna be stuck at that size.”

“Oh…well…you know Tails, there WAS another reason I wanted to be bigger.”

“Oh yeah? What’s that?” Tails didn’t even look at her as he got his tools together.

“Well there are some rides at Twinkle Park that I REALLY wanted to ride, but they wouldn’t let me because I was too small. But now that I’m big, I can ride them!”

Tails raised an eyebrow at her and pulled off his goggles. “Lemme guess, it’s that really huge and fast roller coaster that Twinkle Park is famous for, right?”

Cream nodded excitedly. “That’s it! Can we go Tails? Please? I promise I’ll shrink to normal after!” She pleaded with her eyes.

Tails sighed. “Hate to tell you this Cream, but just because you’re MY size doesn’t mean you’re big enough to ride that roller coaster. I’M not big enough either.”

The rabbit noticeably deflated at that. “I’m still too small?” Then she looked up with a hopeful expression. “Well, could you make me bigger then?”

“Didn’t we just discuss this?”

Cream hopped over to the fox boy and looked into his eyes with a pleading expression. “Oh please Tails! Please please PLEASE! It’s just for one day! No one ever has to know! Just for today, make me grow!” She suddenly smiled. “Hey that rhymes!” She giggled.

Tails’ resolve was weakening as he stared into the big brown eyes of the not as little girl pleading with him, and with a heavy sigh, he agreed. “Ok Cream, since it’s just for today, I’ll make you big…BUT, we will never speak of this again afterwards, this isn’t something I’m at all comfortable about doing, especially since we’re sneaking around behind your mom’s back.”

Cream squealed with glee and jumped up and down before hurrying back over to the measuring wall. “I’m sure mommy wouldn’t mind, she’s always telling me how proud she is of me for being such a big girl! So the bigger I am, the prouder she’ll be!”

“I don’t think she meant it quite like that.” Tails prepared the ray to fire again, then he looked up to address Cream. “So this time I’ll ask…how big do you WANT to be?”
112321121121.title: 3 inch growth spurt

choices: They make it to Twinkle Park
Cream grows more on the way
1123211211211.content:
Cream thought about it for a moment and then smiled. “Well, in my dream last night I was REALLY big!” She jumped up and tried to tap the right spot with her hand. “That’s too small!” Instead she decided to start flapping her ears and she hovered right at the height she remembered. “I was about this big! Can you make me this big?”

The boy’s eyes widened a bit at where Cream was now. “That’s really big alright, are you sure that’s what you want Cream?”

Cream nodded excitedly. “I wouldn’t even mind being BIGGER than that! I want to be so big that I can hug all my friends at once!”

That made Tails blush a little. “We’d probably have to make you TOO big for that. Stand where you were before and we’ll get started.” Tails wanted to hurry before Cream decided she wanted to grow even more. “Ok, here we go.”

Once again the green waves began to bombard the rabbit again. “Oh! They tickle now!” Cream then squeaked again as she felt herself stretch more intensely than before. “I’m already bigger!”

“That’s because I increased the intensity of the ray, now you’ll grow much faster.”

The stretching continued, and Cream looked around the room in awe even as everything around her seemed to become smaller and smaller. “You’re getting small Tails!” She giggled.

“And you’re getting huge! You must be almost twice my height now! We better stop.”

“No wait! Just a little longer, please!” Cream closed her eyes and really felt herself stretching taller, her young mind imagining all the great things she could do now that she was a big girl. “Just a little bigger, then we can stop.”

Tails waited for about one second more, and the rabbit made one final growth spurt just before he stopped firing. “That’s enough, you’re already more than twice my height.”

Cream slowly opened her eyes, and she looked around the room in awe of how small everything looked now. “Wow! I’m so big now!”

Tails went over to the wall and flew up to get the measurement, and his eyes widened a bit at the number. “5 feet, 5 inches…you’re almost as big as Vector now…”

“Really?!” Cream squealed in excitement. “That means I’m SURELY big enough to ride the Rollercoaster now! Oh thank you, thank you Tails!”

“Uh, you’re welcome…” Tails blushed as the giant rabbit wrapped him up into a huge hug, picking him up off the ground in her excitement. “Can you put me down now?”

“Oh! Sorry!” Cream obliged, and she turned her head as Cheese came over and flew around her. “Isn’t this amazing Cheese? Look how big I am! I can help so many people and do so many things I couldn’t before!”

“Chao chao!”

“Yeah, well, if we’re gonna go we better just go, the sooner this is over the better, the last thing I want is for your mom to find out what I did. Hopefully we don’t run into any of our friends while we’re there.”

“Don’t worry Tails! I’m sure everything will be fine! Let’s hurry!” With that, Cream ran out the door of the lab, and Tails started to fly in order to keep up with her.

“I hope she’s right…somehow I have a bad feeling about this.”
1123211211211.title: Cream's a big girl now!

choices: Tails gets his wish, Cream is getting even bigger
11232112112111.content:
It didn’t take long for the two kids to make their way to Twinkle Park, and it took even less time for Tails to notice that Cream was on the receiving end of a lot of strange or even nervous looks while they were waiting in line.

“Cream, I think your size is freaking people out.”

“But why Tails?” Cream looked down at the now small fox with a frown, “Don’t they know I don’t want to hurt anyone?”

“I guess not. It DOES seem a little weird for a rabbit to grow as big as you have, so maybe they’re worried something’s going to happen.”

Cream’s face adopted a determined expression. “Then I’ll just have to be extra polite from now on so people know that all I want to do is help!” Once it was their turn in line, Cream smiled at the girl in the ticket booth. “Excuse me Miss, could we PLEASE have two tickets to go inside the park?”

The fox girl looked up from her station and flinched when she saw the giant rabbit smiling at her. “Uh…two tickets? Yeah-yeah sure, no problem.”

Cream’s smile grew. “Thank you so much!” She looked down at Tails, “You see Tails? I told you everything would be ok! Being big is so cool!”

The red fox handed two tickets to the large rabbit and smiled nervously. “Here ya go…heh, so…is that your little brother or something?”

“Hey!”

Cream shook her head. “No Miss, he’s just one of my best friends in the whole wide world!”

The fox raised an eyebrow. “Um…just wondering here…how old are you exactly?”

Tails flinched in discomfort. “Please don’t answer that Cream.” He mumbled to himself.

Unfortunately, Cream was all too happy to answer. “I’m 6 years old! But I’ll be 7 in a few months!”

At that, the fox girl’s eyes widened at that. “Did you say 6? Not 16…6? 6 years old?”

“That’s right!”

“But…but…but you’re huge! I mean no offense but…you’re the biggest rabbit I’ve ever seen!”

Cream smiled at that. “Really? Thank you so much! I’m really enjoying being big, but after today I’ll have to be small again.”

“Uh….wha?”

“Cream!” Tails suddenly shouted. “We should really get inside, there are a lot of people waiting in line behind us!”

Cream turned around and saw all the angry faces, and she frowned at the sight. “I’m sorry everyone! We’ll be going now!” Cream turned back around and have a cute wave to the ticket girl. “I hope you have a nice day, thank you for the tickets!”

As she watched the giant bunny walk off with the small fox boy behind her, she shook her head and tried to snap out of it. “I really need to stop eating pepperoni pizza before bed.” She thought.

Once they were inside the theme park, Tails tugged on the hem of Cream’s dress and got her attention. “Cream, you can’t just say stuff like that, you’re gonna make people more suspicious than they already probably are.”

“Oh, I’m sorry Tails, I’ll try to remember that!”

“Good.” Tails nodded and looked around the area, families and friends were all walking around, minding their own business and having a good time. “Well, we’re here…” Tails relinquished a small smile. “What does the new, bigger Cream want to do first?”

Cream’s eyes lit up as she looked around the park, now that she was big, there was nothing she wouldn’t be allowed to do. She’d spent years measuring herself at all the different fun rides her bigger friends got to go on, and she was always told that maybe next year she’d be big enough.

Now she was big enough for everything.

“I know! Why don’t we go to the big slide?! I wanna know what it feels like to go down by myself instead of with Amy sitting behind me!”

As apprehensive as he was, Tails couldn’t help but smile at how excited she was. “If that’s what you want, then lead the way, just make sure you’re careful and don’t hurt anyone on the way there.”

“Oh of course!” She nodded vigorously, “We’re going to walk there like nice people, just because I’m big doesn’t mean I get to be rude!”

“Good, let’s go then.”

The two young children walked over to the giant slide in the middle of the park and got in line, with Cream blissfully unaware of all the odd looks she was getting as she passed people.

Oddly enough, even Tails was beginning to stop noticing, as Cream’s excitement started to rub off on him. “It’s almost our turn Tails! Ooh I’m so excited!”

“Me too Cream.”

Once they climbed to the top after retrieving their mats, Cream’s eyes lit up and she looked down at Tails. “Oh! I have an idea!”

“What’s that?”

“Why don’t we race to the bottom like Mr. Sonic always does? Amy never let us because I was always with her, but now I can have fun like everyone else!”

Tails took on a thoughtful expression before smiling up at her. “Ok, you’re on! At least racing YOU I’ll have a chance, racing SONIC is like trying to race the wind.”

“I know! He’s so fast!” Cream set down her mat at the same time as Tails and took a seat, “Ok Cheese, make sure you hold on tight!”

“Chao chao!” Cheese gripped onto Cream’s huge dress and wrapped himself up with some extra fabric.

“Ok Cream, I’m gonna count to three, and we go on three, ready?”

“Ready!”

“Alright…1…2…3!”

The two raced down the slide as fast as they could, using their arms to propel themselves forward, but once they reached the bottom, there was only one winner.

“Yay! We won!” Cream jumped up and down for joy.

By the time Tails got there, he was panting from the exertion. “Yep, but I was close!”

“That was so much more fun than when Amy rides behind me, right Cheese?” Cream looked down to where her chao was, and she gasped when she saw the little creature with swirls in his eyes and the little ball over his head morphed into a swirl as well. “Cheese! Oh no, are you ok?!”

“Chaaaaaooooo…”

“I guess Cheese wasn’t ready to go that fast.” Tails said.

“Is that it? Oh Cheese, I’m so sorry!” She hugged her little chao softly to comfort him. “Don’t worry, you don’t have to ride anymore rides unless you want to.”

“Chao chao…”

“Well, so much for that.” Tails rubbed the back of his neck awkwardly, “So…what’s next?”

“Ooh, I know! How about that really fast ride that Amy keeps trying to get Sonic to ride with her?!”

“You mean the Himalaya?” Tails blushed, “But…that’s the one where the G-forces end up getting the riders squashed together.”

“Yeah! I was never big enough before! But now I’m SO big that we’ll be able to ride together and neither of us will get hurt!”

“Well, you’re probably right, but still…”

“Oh please Tails!” The giant bunny got on her knees so she was closer to his eye level and folded her hands, “Let’s go together! It’ll be so much fun, I know it will!”

Once again the fox boy found himself staring into the (even bigger) brown eyes of Cream the Rabbit, and his heart melted at her pleading expression. “Well, I guess it could be fun to ride together.”

“Thank you Tails!”

Again Tails found himself wrapped up into a hug courtesy of the growing rabbit, and he felt his cheeks heat up further as her arms enveloped him and he was pressed into her chest. “This feels…nice…” He thought to himself. He found himself closing his eyes as a smile spread across his face from the warm feeling of Cream’s hug. “I wonder how…it would feel if…she were bigger…”

But the hug eventually ended, and Tails was internally shocked to find how he wished it would’ve lasted longer. “Come on Tails! Let’s hurry before the line gets too long!” She ran off.

Tails watched as the big little girl ran towards their destination, and he shook his head to try and get himself back to normal. “Don’t think like that, she has to shrink back, Vanilla will kill me if I leave her like this!” But then he smiled tenderly, unbeknownst to even himself, “But I guess I can still enjoy today…maybe I can get her to hug me again.”
11232112112111.title: Time to have some fun!

choices: Cream flies back to the workshop to get the Growinator
112321121121112.content:
With his heart beating faster than it ever had before, Tails ran to catch up with Cream, and the two did eventually get on the ride, with Cream riding on the inside and Tails on the outside.

As the ride went faster and faster in circles, Tails eventually lost his grip on the safety bar of their ride car and slid into Cream, who was having the time of her life as her ears flapped in the air and the wind blew in her face.

When he slid into her, she looked down and beamed at him, using one arm to hold him close and the other raised in the air in excitement as she cheered for the ride to go faster.

As they went on ride after ride, Cream’s smile seemed to brighten more and more as the officials in charge of the rides simply chose to let her pass instead of making her stop to see if she was tall enough, and on the rides both she and Tails could ride, she’d eventually taken to holding his hand for no apparent reason.

Tails could tell she wasn’t scared, in fact he was shocked at how much of a thrill seeker she actually was. So the only other logical explanation was that she just wanted to hold his hand. That thought made Tails blush.

Finally the moment Cream had been waiting for arrived. She’d saved the best part for last, and she looked up at the gigantic attraction that for a brief moment made her feel tiny again in comparison.

The Twinkle Park Rollercoaster.

“This is it Tails! The moment I’ve been waiting for!” She looked down at him anxiously, “Oh, I don’t know if I’m ready for this!”

Tails smiled up at her and took hold of her hand, which got her to smile back, “You ARE ready Cream, you’re a big girl now, and you can handle anything that roller coaster can throw at you.”

Hearing that made Cream blush, and she suddenly leaned down and kissed the fox’s cheek, “Thank you Tails! I’m so glad we came together!” She ran off and waved behind her, “I’ll be right back!”

“I’ll be here!” Tails waved and then rubbed the spot where Cream had kissed his cheek, his eyes half-lidded as he watched the giant 6 year old run to the ride. “That was the biggest kiss I’ve ever gotten.”

“Chao chao…”

Tails blushed at the sly face Cheese was making at him, “What? So I think Cream is cute, EVERYONE thinks she’s cute, it’s not uncommon.”

“Chao chao chao.” The Chao flew off to get a snack nearby, leaving Tails standing there by himself.

“It’s not like that ok?!” Tails shouted and crossed his arms with a pout. Of course, the real problem wasn’t that Cheese was teasing him, it was that Cheese was right…he had developed a crush on Cream the Rabbit.

“Well well well, what do we have here?”

Tails’ tails bristled at that voice, and he slowly turned around and his pupils shrank to the size of pinholes at the sight, “B-Brice…”

“Hello MILEY, long time no see.” A tall fox stomped up to the young fox with his two friends, who were even larger than him, “So I hear you’re rolling with the legendary Sonic the Hedgehog nowadays huh? Pretty impressive.”

“Uh we’re…best friends actually…”

“Oh really?” Brice sneered, “Well maybe you should get your best friend to come and meet us, seeing as we’re your old friends and all, remember?”

Tails scowled and shouted up at the three foxes, “I remember that you three bullied me for being younger than everyone else, and for being different!”

“Oh yeah, I remember now, you were different. So MILEY, have you grown a 3rd tail yet?” Brice grabbed Tails’ tails and tugged on them, laughing when Tails screamed in pain, “What’s the matter freak? Didn’t your best friend teach you how to defend yourself?”

“LEAVE HIM ALONE!”

The three bullies looked up and saw a giant rabbit running towards them, and she didn’t look happy to see them. “Uh Bri-dog, that’s a BIG BUNNY!” One of the friends said with a gulp.

“Pfft, big deal.” Brice added injury to insult as he stomped on Tails’ tail before letting go, leaving the fox writhing on the ground. “Who’s that freak? An equally freakish girlfriend?”

“She’s a friend!” Tails growled through gritted teeth.

“That’s right, I’m his friend! And I’m not going to let you hurt him anymore!”

“Like you have a choice. Ace, Champ, knock that girl down a couple of pegs!” The two bigger bullies both attacked, and Cream was held down from helping as the two slightly smaller creatures were able to overpower her.

“Let go of me!”

“Sorry, no can do.” Brice sneered, “You were a bad little girl, so now we have to punish you and your stupid boyfriend. We’re gonna take him to our secret hideout.”

“Uh huh, you’ll never find our secret hideout in the warehouse!”

“Champ, you’re a chump!” Brice snarled and smacked the bigger fox upside the head before growling down at Cream. “I’ll make it clear for you girly. You try to rescue your little boyfriend, and we won’t be happy, and then he won’t be happy either. You got that?” He stood back up and nodded, “Let’s go boys, we’ve got some catching up to do with our old friend.”

Cream watched in horror as the three foxes took Tails away, just as Cheese came over with a huge frown on his face. “What are we going to do Cheese? We have to help Tails!”

“Chao chao chao!”

“I know, but I…I’m not big enough to beat those 3 meanies by myself! Together they’re stronger than I am!” Cream thought for a moment, but then her eyes widened as an idea came to her, “If I’m not big enough to help Tails, then I need to get even bigger!“
112321121121112.title: Blast from the past

choices: Cheese stops firing, Cream is now bigger than the workshop
1123211211211121.content:
Cream flew back to Tails’ workshop as fast as her bigger self could, and as soon as she got there, she opened the door and her eyes fell on the device that had made the once amazing day possible.

“Get the Growinator Cheese!”

Cheese flew over and picked up the ray gun, and hurried over to drop it in the 6 year old’s hands, who ran back outside the moment she got it. “Chao chao chao?”

“I have to Cheese! Tails needs help! The reason I wanted to be big in the first place was because I wanted to help people, and right now, Tails needs my help!”

She looked the gun over and saw a knob that seemed to control its strength. “This is what Tails used to make me grow faster! And we need to go really fast if we’re going to save him from those bullies!”

Cream turned the knob as far as it would go, and then she handed the gun to Cheese who landed on the ground with it and aimed at her.

She missed the faint sparks that came out of the gun when she turned it all the way.

“Ok Cheese, make me bigger!”

Cheese struggled to pull the trigger, but eventually waves of green energy enveloped the young girl and she immediately began shooting up in height.

“I’m growing REALLY fast now!” She marveled as the world around her rapidly dwindled in size compared to her, no longer in short spurts but rather a continuous growth.

“Bigger Cheese!”

Soon Cream was almost as tall as the workshop itself, then she was eye level with it, then she outgrew it.

“Ok stop!”
1123211211211121.title: Time for another growth spurt!

choices: Tails' love makes her grow bigger
11232112112111211.content:
Cheese immediately stopped firing, and he looked up in awe at just how gigantic Cream had become. “Chao chao chao!”

“I know Cheese! I’m huge!” She looked down at the workshop which now only reached her chin and almost couldn’t believe it. “I’m so big that even Tails’ workshop is smaller than me!”

“Chao!”

“Well, now we need to go and save Tails! Those bullies said their hideout was in a warehouse, so we need to go back to Station Square!” Cream waited until Cheese was safely nestled into her fur before she took off, making large gusts of wind as her ears flapped behind her until she was high enough off the ground that it no longer mattered.

With her latest growth spurt making her bigger than some buildings, Cream reached the warehouses within a matter of minutes, and her landing caused the area to rumble a little as her feet hit the ground. “Now we just have to figure out which one of these warehouses Tails is in!”

Cheese flew down and started looking through warehouse windows, and soon he found an abandoned looking one that just so happened to have a light shining through the window. “Chao chao chao chao!”

“What is it Cheese?” The chao pointed his arm at the window, signaling that he had found Tails and his bullies. “He’s in that one?”

“Chao!”

“Ok then!” She stomped over to the large warehouse doors, which were now only a foot or two taller than she was, and glared at them as if they were purposely barring her way. “Don’t worry Tails, I’m coming for you!”

Inside, Tails was being tormented by his childhood bullies. “Please, let me go! Why are you doing this to me AGAIN?!” He sobbed.

“Why you little brat? Because you made us look stupid. You were always so much smarter, everyone loved you, the boy wonder who could do no wrong…well now it’s payback time.”

When Brice took a step forward, the ground shook. When he took another step forward, the ground shook again.

“Hey boss, are you doing that?”

“Don’t be stupid.” Brice snarled behind him. “It must be some kind of earthquake.”

But then the doors to the warehouse burst open, and the sun shined in and revealed a very big and very angry 6 year old. “Where’s Tails?!”

“B-B-B-Boss! The big bunny got even BIGGER!”

“I can see that you idiots, hurry up and get her!”

The two larger foxes stared at each other and ran forward, but instead of attacking Cream, they ran underneath and kept on running until they were long gone.

“Cowards!” Brice shouted. But then Brice gulped when Cream stomped over to him and leaned way down so that her huge face - that was now bigger than he was - was right in front of him. “You think I’m afraid of you? You’re STILL just a little kid!“

“I may only be 6 years old, but I’m bigger than YOU’LL ever be!” She raised her hand and the bully fox braced for impact, but no attack came as Cream merely put her hand between him and Tails. “Now if you’ll excuse me, I’m here to get Tails back!”

The enormous rabbit easily broke the frail ropes that had been used to tie Tails to the pole, and she gently scooped him up and held him in her palm, his shocked form fitting perfectly in her hand. “Cream…did you..?”

“Shh, we’ll talk after!” She whispered to him before glaring back at Brice. “Mr. Brice, I don’t like fighting, I never have, and no matter how big I get, I never will. But if you try to hurt my friends again, I will be very unhappy!”

“Y-You can’t do this to me! I want my revenge! Your stupid boyfriend made a mockery of us when we were kids!”

“I don’t care what you THINK Tails did! He’s the sweetest, kindest person I know, and as long as I’m around, he’ll be safe from bullies like you!” Cream took a deep breath and blew as hard as she could, and Brice was blown into the back of the warehouse from the wind and groaned. “Let’s go Tails.”

As Cream turned to leave the warehouse, Tails found himself looking up in awe at just how big she had become. “Cream, did you use the Growinator to do this?”

She nodded. “I knew I wasn’t big enough to save you by myself, so I hurried to your workshop and grew even more!”

“Wow, thanks Cream.” He said, smiling. “You sure came in the nick of time.”

“Oh you’re welcome Tails.” She gently pressed him against her torso, and she blushed slightly when she felt Tails snuggling into her gigantic body. “That feels good.” She giggled.

“It feels good to me too.” Finally they were clear of the warehouse, and Cream made sure to cup Tails safely in her palm before lifting off, unaware that she’d blown Brice back again as he’d run out screaming. “Hey Cream?”

“Yes Tails?”

“When Brice called me your boyfriend…you didn’t deny it. Was that a mistake?”

Cream shook her head, “No Tails, I think of you as my boyfriend.”

Tails blushed. “But…how can that be?”

“I learned a lot from Mommy and Amy. They told me that if I ever found someone I really liked, I should tell him right away, and that’s you Tails. I love you very much, I’d do anything to make you happy, and you make me happy whenever I’m with you.”

“Wow Cream…that’s the nicest thing anyone’s ever said to me…” He smiled and snuggled into her giant torso. “I guess that means I have the biggest, cutest girlfriend in the world.”
11232112112111211.title: Giantess Cream to the rescue!

choices: Something else is happening to her
112321121121112111.content:
“Aww, thank you Tails.” She gently pressed Tails against her body, but then lightning flashed and thunder rolled, “Oh no, a storm!”

“We’re almost at my workshop, hurry!” Cream landed and gently placed her new boyfriend in front of his workshop. “You’re too big to fit inside, but I have a plan!” Tails ran inside and pressed a button, and seconds later the ground that was his runway opened up. He ran outside just as the rain really began coming down. “Jump down there Cream!”

“Ok!” Without thinking twice, Cream leaped down with Cheese hiding underneath her ear.

“Wow, that was a 60 foot drop…” Tails said in shock. “Well I guess when you’re over 20 feet tall, it doesn’t mean much.” He flew down into the hole and pressed another button, and the roof closed up. “Welcome to your shelter for the night Cream.”

"Wow Tails, when did you make this place?”

“I made it in case I built a plane that was too big for the hangar in my workshop…but this time, it’s going to work as a place for my big girlfriend to hide from the storm.”

“Thanks Tails.” She frowned a little, “But Mommy is going to be so worried if I don’t go home soon.”

“Don’t worry, you just get comfy. I’ll take care of that.” Tails turned and headed over to a telephone, missing the sudden look of Cream being startled by something.
112321121121112111.title: Taking shelter

choices: Tails gives in, how can he resist those (really) big brown eyes?
"No way Cream, I love you too much to let you be in danger."
1123211211211121111.content:
Tails dialed a number, and after a few minutes of talking to Vanilla, he hung up and grinned. “Ok Cream, you and Cheese are staying here tonight to stay safe from the storm.”

“Ok…” Cream was laying on her side with her eyes closed and a soft smile on her face. She opened them a little when Tails came over and rubbed his hand against her gigantic face. “I’m so big Tails…do you think I’m pretty like this?”

“Cream, you’re pretty big or small, now there’s just more of you to love.”

“Mmm…I love you too Tails.” She nuzzled her face against his small body and blushed. “Hey Tails? I think I’m getting bigger.”

“Bigger Cream…” Tails had a goofy look on his face, but then his brain registered what she said and his eyes widened, “Wait, what?”

Cream slowly nodded and smiled. “I feel warm, and I think I feel stretches. I’m growing again, I’m getting even bigger Tails.”

Tails jumped back and got a full view of his apparently growing girlfriend. Sure enough, there were slow and slight stretches happening to her body.

It was happening really slowly, but Cream was getting even bigger.

Tails paced back and forth as his young mind tried to figure out what was happening…besides the obvious that is.

“This is really bad…Cream you shouldn’t be growing on your own, you’re already over 20 feet tall, and now you’re getting even bigger? How do we know you won’t grow out of control?!”

“But Tails, I LIKE being big, why is this so bad?”

Tails turned and looked way up as Cream had decided to sit up and was now towering over the fox boy. “Because we don’t know how big you could get…how do we know you won’t eventually outgrow the whole PLANET?!”

“Oh…I didn’t think about that…I guess that WOULD be too big.”

“I can’t let that happen to you Cream, I’ve got to find a way to shrink you back down before you get too big, and it needs to happen as soon as possible. I didn’t foresee this happening at all, and so I can’t make any scientific theories as to why you’re growing…which means the best way to keep something terrible from happening is to make you small again ASAP.”

“Well, how are we going to do that?”

Tails rubbed his head in thought, “Well first of all, I need the Growinator so I can start reversing the polarity. Where is it Cream?”

Cream’s eyes widened, “Um…I think I left it in the workshop,” thunder was heard above. “And I don’t think it’d be a good idea to go out there right now.”

“You don’t have it with you?” Tails paled a little, “That means there’s no way for me to shrink you down until at least tomorrow!”

“So I’m just going to keep growing and growing?”

Tails’s brow furrowed, “You don’t sound nearly as concerned as you should be.”

Cream blushed and looked away, “I’m sorry Tails…” by now Cream had already gained an extra 5 feet in height, and Cheese was on top of her head, bouncing up and down on her head as she grew. “I’ve just really enjoyed being big, and the bigger I get, the more I can help people! If I hadn’t made myself bigger, I wouldn’t have been able to save you!”

“I’m not denying that Cream, and I’m grateful for you saving me…but this ISN’T a good thing, you HAVE to shrink down. You can’t live life growing forever and ever!”

“I don’t want to grow FOREVER! Then I wouldn’t be able to be with you and Cheese and Mommy and all my other friends!” Cream took Tails into her hand and lifted him up to her face. Now just her eye was bigger than Tails’s whole body. “I just want to keep growing for a little longer, I want to see just how big I can get!”

Sitting down in her slowly increasing hand, Tails raised an eyebrow, “And when do you think you’ll be big enough?”

Cream raised her other hand to her chin in thought, “I don’t know.” She smiled, “But I’m sure I’ll know when I’m finally big enough once I AM big enough!” She started to stand up, and Cream looked up at the ceiling once she was at her full height. “I want to grow and grow and grow until my head reaches the ceiling!”

Tails’s eyes widened, “Cream…the ceiling in this place is over 60 feet high, do you have any idea how BIG that is? You’ll more than DOUBLE your current height!”

“That much?” Cream looked back down at the fox boy in her hand, “Please understand Tails, I know that eventually I have to be small again, that’s why I want to see how big I can grow before I shrink back down. I’ll never get to see the world like this again without flying.”
1123211211211121111.title: She's growing again

choices: Cream grew a little more than expected, she's 60 feet tall while sitting down
There's no room left, Cream is about to outgrow the shelter!
11232112112111211111.content:
Tails gave a long sigh and looked right in the pleading eye of his ever-growing girlfriend, “Ok Cream.”

Cream cheered and brought her tiny-in-comparison boyfriend up to her mouth, “Oh thank you Tails! Thank you so much!” She gently pressed her lips against his body, and Tails fell onto his back after she broke it, “Are you ok?”

“I’m uh…wow…” Tails laughed, “That was something special. I take back what I said earlier, THAT is the biggest kiss I’ve ever gotten.”

Cream giggled, “Well get ready Tails, because the kisses are just going to get bigger,” She kissed him again, “And bigger,” She kissed him again, “And BIGGER!”

By now Tails had zoned out from all the love, and it took him a few minutes for him to get back to his senses. “You’re making me change my mind about stopping you from growing.” He admitted.

“So now you WANT me bigger?”

Tails shrugged, “Why not? Just grow Cream, grow as big as you can, you deserve to be happy, and if growing makes you happy, then go for it.”

“Well in that case, I think we should go to sleep now.”

Tails blinked, “Huh? Go to sleep? I don’t get it.”

“Mommy told me that sleeping makes you grow faster, so if I go to sleep now, I’ll be MUCH bigger when I wake up in the morning!”

“That seems logical,” Tails shrugged, “Well, if that’s what you want, I’ll dim the lights for you so you can go to sleep.”

“Um…” Cream blushed.

“What’s the matter?”

“Well…I was hoping that…maybe we could sleep together? I really like having you near me, it makes me feel warmer inside than growing does.”

Tails blushed and rubbed his neck, “Well…I’d like to Cream, but the bed I’m using for the night is on the other end of the shelter, and I’m not strong enough to life it by myself.“

Cream smiled, “But your big girlfriend is!” The gigantic rabbit walked over to the other end of the shelter, which for her only took a few steps to do, and she picked up the tiny bed with one hand and brought it over to the other end of the shelter, gently placing it on the ground, “There, now we can be together tonight!”

“Yeah, guess we can.” Tails dimmed the lights so that there was only just enough to see by, and then he climbed into bed and watched as his growing girlfriend laid down next to the bed, her enormous brown eyes sparkling at him as she laid on her side and got comfortable. “Um…are you sure you’ll be okay like that? I don’t have any pillows or blankets big enough for you.”

Cream nodded, “Just having you near me will keep me warm tonight…but there is one more thing I need before I can go to sleep.”

“What’s that?”

Cream gently scooped Tails out of his bed and pressed him against her growing body, “Every night before bed, Mommy gives me a big hug to get me to relax, now I need YOU to hug me.”

“I guess I can do that.” He spread his arms out and pressed as hard as he could into her chest, “I can feel the fabric moving as you grow.”

After a minute or so, Cream put Tails back on his bed and closed her eyes, but not before she pulled the closer to her face so she could be as near as him as possible. “I’m still so small, I could be so much bigger…I’m going to grow big just for you Tails, you deserve to have the biggest and best girlfriend in the universe.”

“I already do Cream.” Tails placed his hands on her face and snuggled close, “Sweet dreams.”

The two young people went to sleep, and Cream couldn’t wait to see how big she would be when she woke up.

Exactly how big is that?
11232112112111211111.title: Bigger Cream, bigger kisses!

choices: "I think I'll keep growing for a while."
112321121121112111111.content:
All through the night, Cream grew and grew and grew, slowly increasing in size until morning when she woke up and groggily opened her eyes and blinked a few times to get the sleep out of her system.

“What an amazing dream.” She rubbed her eye with her fist, and then they widened when she remembered what had happened the previous day. “It wasn’t a dream!” She sat up, and she was shocked to find that her head nearly reached the ceiling just sitting down. “I’m even bigger than I thought I would be!” She looked around the now much smaller in comparison area to find her new boyfriend. “Tails, are you here?!”

“Well, morning Cream.”

Cream turned her head and saw the tiny figure of Tails walking over with none other than the Growinator in his hand. “Look at me Tails! I’m so big my head reaches the ceiling sitting down!”

“I noticed.” Tails smirked, “Which means I have to hurry and open the hatch.”

“Why is that?”

“You mean you can’t tell?”

“Tell what?” Cream’s eyes suddenly widened, and she felt her body give a sudden stretch, and she felt her ears touch the ceiling. “I’m STILL growing!”

“And it looks like you were right, going to sleep made you start to grow faster, so I gotta open the hatch and get you out before you’re too big to fit through.” Tails went over and pressed the switch to open the hatch, and he did it just in time, as another growth spurt made Cream’s head go right through where the roof would’ve been. “Just in time.”

“Wow.” Cream stood up, and up, and up, until she was finally standing tall at her full enormous height, then she climbed out of the hole with the help of another growth spurt and got back on solid but wet ground, causing her shoes to make huge marks in the mud.

At that moment, Tails and Cheese came flying out of the shelter as well, and flew up to meet the still growing 6 year old. “Chao chao chao!”

“Yes Cheese, this is really amazing!” She stretched and grew again, “I’m really really REALLY big!” She grew again, “And I’m STILL growing! I wonder how much bigger I’ll get!”

“Well if you wanna keep growing Cream, we better go somewhere more private than this, if someone sees you at this size they might panic.” Tails said as he flew right up to her enormous eyeball, just before it grew again. By now his lab only reached her ankles.

“You’re right Tails! Let’s go deep into the Mystic Ruins so no one will see me and get scared!” Cream scooped Tails into her palm and placed him on her shoulder, “There, now just hang on tight, I’m so big that it’ll only take a few minutes for us to get there!”

She flapped her ears for takeoff, causing a huge gust of wind as she did so, and in just minutes they reached the deepest part of the Mystic Ruins, where no life existed except for them.

And a cat who loved to fish. “Hey Froggy? Did you see just Cream?”

“Ribbit.”

“Girls sure are growing up fast these days.” Big shrugged and went back to fishing.

Back with Tails and Cream, the two had just landed…the trees that had once been cause of frustration with navigation to how close together they were no longer got in their way, as Cream had grown so big that now just her shoes were taller than they were.

And she was still growing.

“So Cream, think you’re big enough yet?”

“Hmm,"
112321121121112111111.title: Wish come true, and then some

1123211211211121111112.content:
She had another stretch and grew again, “I think I’ll keep growing for a while, there’s still a lot of room left for me, and the view is so amazing! I can almost see everything from here!”

“Yeah, the view is pretty amazing.”

“Chao chao!”

“But you have to know Cream,” Tails said, “As much as you’re enjoying this, you DO have to shrink back down eventually, your mom is probably waiting for you at home, and she can’t see you like that.”

“I know, I don’t think even mommy would want me to be THIS big…although she did say how proud she was of me for becoming a big girl, and the bigger I am, the prouder she’ll be! Right?”

Tails chuckled and shook his head, even as he felt the fabric underneath him shift from another growth spurt. “That’s not what she meant Cream. She didn’t necessarily mean your physical body, she meant you were growing up, as in becoming more mature, learning, you don’t need her to take care of EVERYTHING for you anymore, you’re more independent now, even BEFORE you started growing like this.”

“Oh…that makes sense.” Cream nodded as she grew again. By now the trees only reached a third of the way up her shoes. “But what about you Tails? You LIKE me this big right?”

“I told you, I’d like you at ANY size. Just because you wouldn’t be a giant anymore doesn’t mean I’d want to stop being your boyfriend.”

The growing girl pondered this for a moment, then she looked around the area and saw the view. Even in the deepest parts of the jungle, she was easily able to see where the mine cart that led to the train station was, she had grown so much in so little time it was amazing…but at this point she came to a decision.

"Tails,"
1123211211211121111112.title: "I think I'll keep growing for a while,"

choices: They go to have some normal-sized fun
11232112112111211111121.content:
“I think I’m finally big enough.”

The fox boy nodded with a smile and flew down to the ground, losing sight of her face as the only thing he could see through the trees was the very bottom of her enormous shoe. “Ok Cream!” He shouted as loud as he could, “Get ready! Going down!”

After reversing the ray’s polarization, Tails pulled the trigger and a red beam came out of it, and Cream squealed as her perspective suddenly changed dramatically. Soon the trees were ankle height, then her shin, then her chest…still smaller she shrunk until the trees overtook her height…and then finally she went back down to her original height, with Tails looking slightly down at her with a sympathetic smile on his face.

“So how did that feel?”

Cream shook herself a little to try and get the tingling sensation away. “Not as good as growing.” She was then ambushed by a little chao who was obviously extremely happy to see her back to normal. “Aww Cheese!” She giggled.

The fox chuckled. “I’ll make a note of it.” He ran up and embraced her, and he released a happy exhale when she hugged him back. “It feels nice to be able to do this again.”

“Yeah it does.” Cream pulled back for a moment and looked into Tails’ baby blue eyes, “Thank you for the amazing adventure Tails, I’ll never forget it.”

“Don’t mention it.” When she laughed, Tails gave her a serious look. “No I mean it, DON’T MENTION IT, to ANYONE. I don’t wanna get in trouble if your mom ever found out.”

Cream nodded solemnly. “Ok Tails, it’ll be our BIG secret!”

They laughed at the joke, and they took off towards home, flying above the trees and towards the lab. “Well now I guess I’ll have to finish my notes, this whole experience has given me tons of data regarding the Growinator’s capabilities.”

“Glad I could help!”
11232112112111211111121.title: Back to normal

choices: Cream is going to save the world
112321121121112111111211.content:
But then suddenly, Tails’ watch started beeping loudly. “That’s the emergency signal!” He pressed the button and Sonic’s face suddenly appeared, “Sonic, what’s going on?!”

“It’s Eggman, Tails. He’s making an announcement from all over the world…check it out.”

Tails pressed a couple more buttons and the feed suddenly came up.

“In just seven minutes, my newest Death Egg will be fully charged and ready to fire…and unless the world surrenders to me immediately, I shall destroy you all! Not even Sonic the Hedgehog can save you now, even the fastest thing alive can’t get to space in just seven minutes…not without this.”

He pulled out a Chaos Emerald, and both Tails and Cream gulped in horror…

If Eggman had a Chaos Emerald, that meant Sonic wouldn’t be able to go super and stop him in time.

“The choice is yours people of Earth, surrender or die…you now have six minutes left.”

The feed cut off, and Sonic’s face reappeared, more grim than it had ever been before. “Hate to say Eggman’s right, but he’s right. No way we can get up there in just six minutes without a transporter of some kind. Any ideas buddy?”

“Hang on I’m thinking!” Tails racked his brain feverishly as he tried to come up with a plan on the spot, but every possibility he came up with was quickly dismissed as doomed to fail. “Nothing we do will be fast enough!”

“Tails!”

The fox boy looked over and took a good look at the rabbit girl hovering next to him. She looked very determined, and it was then that Tails realized what they had to do. “Sonic, I just got a BIG idea.”
112321121121112111111211.title: The world is in danger!

1123211211211121111112111.content:
With only 5 minutes left on the clock, Tails was working feverishly to try and reset the settings on the Growinator…at this rate it was the only idea he had left…and man it was crazy.

“I’m almost finished.”

“So what’s the plan Tails?” Cream asked.

Tails looked up from his work to regard the small again rabbit with an anxious glance. “The plan is simple…I just don’t know if I should do it or not…”

“What is it?”

“You’re gonna grow Cream, you’re gonna grow A LOT. The plan is to make you so big that the Death Egg won’t be able to hurt you…but I’m worried it won’t work, and you won’t survive if you take a direct hit from the Death Egg!”

“But we know it works!”

“The ray works, but do you have any idea how big you have to get? Remember what I said about you outgrowing the planet? That’s pretty much what needs to happen! We only have like 5 minutes left!”

“Then we need to just hurry and not argue!”

Tails gulped and nodded at her, “Ok, I’m finished.” He pulled something out from behind his back and handed it to her, “Put that in your ear, you’re gonna need it to hear me.”

Cream looked at the small device and placed it in her ear, and she soon heard static as the speaker activated. “I hear static.”

Tails then pulled a headset out of nowhere and placed it on his head, and then he activated the microphone. “Can you hear me?”

Cream nodded, “Yeah!”

“Then we’re as ready as we’ll ever be…” He looked at her in worry, “Are you sure you wanna go through with this?”

She nodded again. “I wanted to be big so I could help people, now I need to be big enough to help EVERYONE! Make me grow Tails!”

“Ok.” He pointed the gun at her and pulled the trigger, and Cream immediately began increasing in size, bigger and bigger until her head again cleared the trees, and then the rest of her began to follow as her growth sped up. Then Tails flew up and landed in her dress pocket, which continuously became more roomy as she grew. “We only have 3 minutes left! Start flying Cream!”

Cream flapped her ears and lifted off, causing a huge gale of wind below where the now tiny trees blew in the wind she made. She could feel herself growing as she ascended, and the bigger she got, the faster she moved she noticed. Already her head had reached the clouds, and they looked like tiny pieces of cotton to her. “Wow…the clouds look so small…and I’m still growing…”

As for Tails, he settled himself in her ever-increasing pocket and was trying to make sure he didn’t get lost in the valley of fabric. “And you’re still way too small, you’re nothing but a speck of dust on this newest Death Egg’s radar even at this size, I’m gonna be pushing this trigger for as long as I can, we’re down to 2 minutes so keep flying up!”

Nodding to herself, Cream resumed her journey upwards, her thoughts whirling as she pondered how she could be so big and yet still so small. She figured that by now Tails was about as small as a tiny ant compared to her and yet the Death Egg would think the same thing about her. “I have to keep growing, I need to be big! Everyone is counting on me!” She thought to herself determinedly, “Come on Cream, grow!”
1123211211211121111112111.title: Giantess Cream to the rescue...again!

choices: Cream stops growing, the whole planet is a small dot compared to her
11232112112111211111121112.content:
Suddenly Tails felt a lurch, and he gave a small yelp as he looked around and noticed that somehow the fabric around him was growing faster than ever. “I didn’t do that…” He said to himself.

“Bigger, BIGGER!” Cream grunted with effort, unaware that her thoughts were having an active effect on her growth spurt. “I have to save everyone, I have to save Tails and Mommy and Cheese, I need to grow BIGGER!”

Cream kept flying up and up as she grew and grew and grew, bigger than she ever could have imagined, so big that the highest mountains below barely reached the bottom of her shoes…

And still she grew.

Moments later she found herself in space itself, the planet’s gravity no longer sufficient to keep her confined to its boundaries…and still she grew bigger…

And bigger…

And BIGGER…

“Wow…” Tails looked straight up the seemingly never-ending walls that was his girlfriend’s pocket, and he could just barely see some stars beyond her utterly enormous face. “She’s bigger than continents by now…” He chuckled dryly, “So much for keeping this a secret, by now she’s so big everyone on the planet can see her.”

And she was still growing.

“I need to be big, I’m too small, much too small…I’m teeny,”

Her continous growth gave a sudden burst of speed.

“I’m tiny,”

Another spurt.

“I’m so so small, I need to grooooooooow!”

She shouted in determination, and her growth spurt sped up even more, her eyes were closed as she focused only on growing bigger and the billions of people who were counting on her to be a big girl and save them all. “Bigger…”

“Cream!”

She heard Tails voice, and her efforts doubled and she felt herself growing even faster, he was counting on her too! He made her so happy whenever they were together, it was always fun to be with him, she needed to save him too, and she knew that to do that she needed to keep growing. “Bigger…”

“Cream!”

The voice sounded so worried, oh no she wasn’t growing fast enough! She was probably still much too small to stop the Death Egg, and there must’ve been only seconds left! “Don’t worry Tails! I’ll make sure I’m big enough to save you! I won’t let Dr. Eggman hurt you or anyone else! Come on, grow grow grow grow GROOOOW!”

Her growth sped up even more, she could feel herself growing so fast now that the tingling was almost unpleasant, but she didn’t care, she needed to be big, she needed to be the biggest she could possibly be, the world was counting on her, TAILS was counting on her, and she refused to let them down. “I WILL BE BIG!”

“CREAM!”
11232112112111211111121112.title: Growing determination

112321121121112111111211121.content:
The rabbit’s eyes snapped open, and she looked around to see she was floating in space, no longer needing to fly in order to stay airborne. “Oh wow, this is so cool!”

“Yeah, I’ll bet it is.”

She placed a hand to her ear and took note of the voice speaking to her through the speaker. “Am I still too small Tails?”

She heard him scoff. “Too small? I think by now you’re definitely big enough.”

“Oh…well, where’s the Death Egg?”

“You’re floating in front of it.”

“Huh?” Cream looked around in confusion for a few moments, “Where is it?” Then she looked straight ahead, and she saw a tiny round speck floating in front of her nose. She got closer and squinted to see it, and then her eyes widened in shock as she realized what it was. “No way!”

The Death Egg, the gigantic weapon of mass destruction that threatened to destroy everyone and everything she loved, was nothing more than a dust mote in front of her nose…she was now so big that she could barely even see it…

And that thought made her feel humongous in the best possible way…and for a brief moment she grew slightly bigger by accident as a result.

“I’m…big.”
