“Yeah Cream, you’re big alright, you’re ENORMOUS.” Tails chuckled as he looked down at his scanner device. “Look behind you.”

Cream did, and she gaped in awe at the sight, “Is that…the Earth?”

“You’re a big girl now Cream, you grew so much that Earth is barely a speck compared to you. So imagine what I must be like.”

Seeing the Earth so small that she was barely able to see it shocked her, and as she tried to do what Tails said, she found she couldn’t. “I don’t think I can think that small!”

This time Tails gave a hearty laugh. “Well, if the timer were still going, I’d say the Death Egg was about to fire,”

“Oh yeah!” Cream turned back around and put her hands on her hips, “I bet Dr. Eggman’s mean old Death Egg can’t hurt me now!”

“You’d be right, and Eggman knows it…” He grinned, “That’s why he’s decided to surrender instead of trying to fight back.”

“REALLY?!“

“Yep! Congratulations Cream, you saved the world!”

“Oh thank you Tails!” She squealed in excitement, “I couldn’t have done it without you! You’re the one who made me grow this big, it’s so amazing being this size!”

“Just don’t try to hug me right now ok?” He chuckled. “You’re at least 100 times the size of the whole planet, and that’s probably not even a close guess, if you tried to hug me now I’d get hurt.”

“Oh…really?”

“Actually…” Tails thought for a moment, “I take it back, you’re probably so big that if you tried to hug me right now, I’d be able to hide under a wrinkle in your glove and be just fine, so hug me all you want!”

“I think I can wait.”

Tails laughed again, and after a few more moments of silence between them, Tails spoke again. “It’s beautiful out here, isn’t it?”

“It sure is…we never really get to see it when we’re in danger, it’s so pretty with all the stars.”

“And to think, even as big as you are now, you’re still microscopic compared to the rest of the galaxy, there’s a whole universe out there waiting to be explored…maybe one day we’ll go out and explore it.”

“I’m still small?” A brief shrinking feeling came over the rabbit girl, and that made her want to grow more to make it go away.
112321121121112111111211121.title: The Adorable Star-Sized Bunny

choices: Cream wants to grow even more and explore the universe
Cream wants to go home now
1123211211211121111112111211.content:
So she did.

“Whoa!” Tails looked around in shock, again the fabric around him was moving somehow…was she…growing? “Cream stop!”

The girl blinked and looked back down at her pocket. “What’s the matter Tails?”

“You grew again!”

She blinked again. “I did?” She looked back at the Earth, and to her surprise it seemed smaller than ever. “Wow, I did! But how’d I do that?”

“That’s a mystery we’ll solve later.” He looked back down at his scanner, “I just got the signal from Eggman, he and everyone else there with him are clear of the Death Egg. It’s time to destroy it.”

“Ok!” Squinting to get an idea of where it was, Cream took her thumb and index finger and easily crushed the Death Egg between them. The explosion making her shake her hand a little. “That stung a little bit.”

“You ok?!”

“Yes, it was only a little prickly, I’m ok.”

Tails sighed in relief. “Good.” He looked back down at his scanner. “Eggman has gone back to Earth, that means it’s time for us to go home Cream…I’ve got a lot of explaining to do to your mom now.”

Cream hummed sympathetically. “Don’t worry Tails, I’ll be there with you, I’ll make sure she understands that I wanted to do this, I won’t let her punish you!”

Tails chuckled a little and pulled the Growinator out, again reversing the polarity. “Ready to shrink back down?”
1123211211211121111112111211.title: Unintended growth

choices: Vanilla takes Cream home and asks about her adventure
11232112112111211111121112112.content:
“Yeah. Being this big is really cool, but I really wanna go home now.” Cream looked back down at the tiny speck that was her home planet, still shocked that she’d actually grown so enormous that she could barely even see it. “I’m so so big, I think I succeeded in being the biggest girlfriend ever.”

“I’d say so.”

“Ok Tails, shrink me.” She closed her eyes and felt the other sensation overtake her, and a few minutes later after Tails gave her the go-ahead, she began her descent back down to the planet she called home. “I can’t wait to be back home.”

As soon as Cream was back to her normal size, the two young people were mobbed by their friends who immediately started asking a lot of questions about what happened, and Amy made them particularly uncomfortable as she asked Tails questions about what else his device could make bigger. “I’m not planning on testing to see if it makes certain body parts bigger Amy, just no.”

But the real issue came when Vanilla broke through and scooped her daughter up into a desperate hug, and then put her back down and began scolding both her and Tails for what they’d done. “I can’t believe you two put yourselves into such danger, what would you have done if you got hurt?!”

Cream stepped ahead of Tails and spread her arms out to try and protect him. “But Mommy, I WANTED Tails to make me grow! I needed to be really big so I could save everyone!”

Vanilla sighed and ran a hand through her hair as she looked down at her heavily pouting daughter. “I’m sorry Cream, I’m really proud of you for saving us, but you know I worry about you, what would’ve happened if something went wrong?”

“I’m sorry Mommy.” Cream hugged her mother again. “I didn’t want to scare you, I just really enjoyed growing! Did you see how big I got?! I was a REALLY big girl! You said you were proud of me for becoming such a big girl two days ago, so you must’ve been REALLY proud just now!”

Vanilla shook her head and laughed a little. “Oh sweetie, that’s not what I meant. I meant I was proud of you for becoming so much more mature, you’re getting to be so smart, so adventurous. You don’t need your mommy to do everything for you anymore, that’s what I meant.”

The 6 year old nodded in understanding, then she turned around to smile at Tails. “I guess you were right Tails, she didn’t mean she was proud of me growing bigger, she meant the other thing.”

“Heh, I told you.”

She beamed and clasped her hands together, “You’re so smart Tails, I’m so glad you’re my boyfriend!”

Suddenly Tails froze and blushed as he looked up in horror at the stunned face of Vanilla. “Uh…”

“Boyfriend?” Vanilla looked down at her daughter with a raised eyebrow. “Boyfriend?”

Cream nodded and smiled innocently, “Yes Mommy, you taught me that when I found someone I really liked, I should tell him right away! I love Tails very much, he makes me happy! So I told him and now we’re boyfriend and girlfriend!”

“I see.”

Tails gulped a little as he wilted under Vanilla’s gaze, she was eyeing him suspiciously…but then a smile appeared on her face.

“Well, I guess if he makes you happy dear, then I can’t say anything.”

Tails exhaled and smiled in relief, and moments later he was tackled by his young girlfriend who was once again smaller than him. “I thought that was gonna go a lot worse.”

“I told you I’d take care of you!” He hugged her back and snuggled his face into her shoulder.

“Yeah you did. Thank you Cream.”

“Well alright, you can see him again tomorrow Cream, right now I’d like to take you home and take care of you, I’m sure you’re hungry after all this.”

As if on cue the little rabbit’s stomach growled, and she gave a quick kiss to Tails cheek before hurrying over to take Vanilla’s hand. “I’ll see you tomorrow Tails! I love you!”

“Heh…love you too.” Tails gave a lazy wave back with a goofy grin on his face, but it quickly disappeared when he felt a gloved hand clamp down on his shoulder.

“So…” Tails turned and saw that Sonic had come up to him and was now grinning cheekily at him, “You like ‘em BIG huh?”

“Sonic!”
11232112112111211111121112112.title: Home again, home again

112321121121112111111211121121.content:
Later, back at the house of the two rabbits, Vanilla made sure that her daughter was fed and clean after her big adventure. “So tell me Cream, was this big adventure of yours the reason why you wanted me to measure you again?”

Cream nodded as she took a bite of her sandwich. “Yes Mommy. Tails was doing experiments and I ate the apple he had made grow, so he wanted me to make sure that it wouldn’t make me start growing too.”

“But it did anyway?”

This time Cream shook her head. “No Mommy.”

Vanilla raised an eyebrow at this. “Then how did my little girl become the biggest little girl ever if it wasn’t that?”

“Because I asked Tails to make me bigger with his Growinator! You see, I’m too small to help a lot of people, and also the Rollercoaster at Twinkle Park, so I asked Tails to make me grow so we could go have fun together! I grew almost as big as Mr. Vector and we went to have fun, then some bullies Tails knew took him away and tried to beat him up, and I wasn’t big enough to stop them, so I went back to his lab and made the Growinator make me even bigger so I could save him! Then after that the storm came and Tails gave me shelter and called you, by then I was growing bigger on my own, I was so happy! Then when I woke up this morning, I was so big I almost didn’t fit in the shelter! He let me out before I outgrew it, and I kept growing for a little while longer before I decided I was big enough, Tails told me he’d love me at any size and that you’d be proud of me even if I wasn’t big, and that’s the story!”

Cream hadn’t stopped talking once during her story, and Vanilla just blinked in shock at what she’d been told. “Well…that certainly sounds…interesting.”

“It was!” She beamed at her mother. “And then when Dr. Eggman said that he was gonna hurt everyone with his Death Egg, I knew that I had to try and save everyone! Mommy, I got so big that Earth looked like THIS to me!” She put her fingers together and showed just how small Earth had looked to the once titanic bunny. “And did you know that even when I was that big, I was still really small compared to the rest of the universe? There was so much room for me to grow bigger and bigger!”

Vanilla was stunned to say the least. She exhaled sharply and pasted on a smile as she wrapped her daughter in a hug. “I’m just glad you’re safe, and that you’re back to normal. I wouldn’t be able to do THIS if you were giant!”

Cream laughed as her mother smothered her in little kisses all over. “Mommy!” She squealed in delight. Once Vanilla stopped, she looked up and grinned at her. “I enjoyed being big, but I’m glad I’m normal now too, I missed your hugs.”

“Chao!”

“And I missed your hugs too Cheese!” She giggled as the chao snuggled up to her face. “So now what should we do?”

“Well, even though you just saved the world, there are still chores that you need to take care of, when was the last time you cleaned your room little lady?”

Cream looked away nervously. “Um…”

Vanilla smiled with a quick nod. “I thought so. Head upstairs and get started dear, I’ll clean up the kitchen.”

“Ok.” The small rabbit sighed and hopped up the stairs to her room. It was indeed a mess. “I need to find a way to make sure this doesn’t happen again.”

“Chao chao…”

“Well, let’s get started.” Cream started by picking up her clothes from the floor and folding it, which took her about 15 minutes since it was all scattered everywhere. “Mommy was right, I needed to clean my room, it looks like Mr. Sonic lives here instead!”

“Chao.”

She then went and put all her dresses on hangers and went over to hang them up. She looked up at the closet and sighed as she started to flap her ears so she could put them on the clothes rack. “Too small again, now I wish I was bigger again.”
112321121121112111111211121121.title: Story time

choices: She stops growing, she can now control her size!
She can't stop, she's going to outgrow her room!
1123211211211121111112111211211.content:
Then…she felt it.

“I’m growing!”

“Chao?!”

Cream was slowly inching upwards, frozen in shock that her size was increasing all over again, not nearly as fast as she had been earlier, but she had already gained an extra two inches and she was still getting bigger. “Why am I growing?!” Now she could reach where she was supposed to hang her clothes, so she quickly did that and closed her eyes. “Stop, stop growing!”
1123211211211121111112111211211.title: Be careful what you wish for

choices: The next day, she flies to Tails' workshop to show him her new power
Change of plans, visit Amy instead
11232112112111211111121112112111.content:
She stopped. She blinked an eye open and felt the feeling go away, she had stopped growing almost immediately, but she had gained an extra 3 inches, making her about Tails size again.

“Chao chao chao?”

“I don’t know Cheese, I said I wanted to be bigger and suddenly I started growing again…” her eyes widened, and she thought for a moment before looking at Cheese determinedly. “Bigger!” She started growing again. “Stop!” She stopped. “Cheese!” A big smile spread across her face, “I think I can grow all by myself whenever I want!”

“Chao chao chao, chao?”

Cream pressed a finger against her chin, “I don’t know Cheese, let me try!” She looked down at herself and then went over to her bedroom wall where a measuring poster was posted. She saw where she’d last been measured and tried to focus on that mark. “Smaller!” She felt herself start to shrink, and she kept shrinking until she met that mark and then she stopped. “I’m back to normal!”

Suddenly Vanilla walked into the room, and she looked over the room before smiling down at her daughter. “I wanted to see how you were doing in here, looks like you’re making progress!”

“Yes Mommy!”

The older rabbit nodded, “Well then, I’ll let you get back to cleaning. Remember, I want it cleaned, not everything stuffed into the closet!”

“I know!” Cream waited until her mother closed the door and walked away, and then she grinned and looked to the top of the poster. It was at least 3 feet away and she wanted to test something. “I want to be bigger!” She started stretching upwards again, and she watched as the mark she’d just shrunk down to was left behind by her growth. “Bigger!” She grew faster, now 3 feet and 6 inches and still growing. “Bigger, BIGGER!” Her growth increased even more, and soon she was at the top of the poster and then some. She grinned as her ears touched the ceiling and giggled as they started to get a little smushed. “I’m getting bigger!” She sang as she sat down and enjoyed her growth. Now that she was sitting she had a little more room to grow, but it was quickly getting taken up by her ever-bigger form. “Ok stop!” She stopped again. Her ears were pressed against the ceiling again, she must’ve been at least 20 feet tall she guessed, but she didn’t know for sure. “I have control over the growth!” She closed her eyes and focused on shrinking, and within minutes she was back to normal.

“Chao chao!”

“I know Cheese!” She grinned, “I think tomorrow I’m going to surprise Tails! I can’t wait!”
11232112112111211111121112112111.title: Brand new super power!

choices: Amy says yes, Cream tries to help her best friend
112321121121112111111211121121112.content:
As Cream finished cleaning her room, her imagination raced with ideas on how she could surprise her genius boyfriend. The nearest she could tell, she’d been zapped by the Growinator so many times that she’d accidentally been given the power to change her size at will.

“Maybe we should go to the lab tomorrow and do some more tests! Only this time we should test how big I can get without the Growinator helping me!”

“Chao chao chao?”

“Well, if I outgrow the planet again, then I can just shrink down to normal after, maybe Tails won’t even want to test this, he might get worried.”

Cream thought for a moment before she looked at her chao friend. “We need to find a way to make sure Tails won’t be scared about this, but how do we do that?”

“Chao chao…”

“Well, we could just be honest about it, but would he try to take the power away somehow?”

“Chao chao chao, chao chao chao chao chao chao.”

“Yeah, I know. It would only be because he cares.” She adopted a determined expression, “We’ll just have to show Tails that this is a good thing somehow!” Then her eyes widened, “Hey! Maybe Amy could come up with some ideas!”

“Chao!”

Cream finished cleaning her room, then she ran downstairs to tell her mom she was leaving. “I’m going to go see Amy!”

“Did you finish cleaning your room?” Vanilla called from the kitchen.

“Yes Mommy!”

“Ok then, make sure you’re home in time for dinner.”

“I will!” Cream grinned and ran out the door, taking a moment to close it behind her. Then she flew a little bit away from the house before landing far enough away that she wouldn’t get spotted.

“Chao?”

Not answering Cheese’s question, Cream focused on growing and grew until she was about Amy’s size, grinning to herself as she imagined her best friend’s reaction. “This is going to be so much fun!” She flapped her ears and began to fly towards Amy’s apartment, and after a little while of flying, she finally landed in front of the apartment building that Amy currently called home. “I wonder if she’s home.”

“Chao.”

“Well, only one way to find out!” Cream hopped up the stairs and finally made it to Amy’s apartment, and she knocked on the door and waited with a big smile for her friend to answer it. “Amy will be so surprised to see me big again.”

After about a minute or so, a voice was heard from behind the door. “Who is it?”

Cream giggled in excitement, “It’s me Amy!” Moments later the door opened, and at first Amy had a smile on her face, but then as she raised her head to look up it disappeared and was replaced by a shocked expression. “Hi!” Cream waved innocently.

For a second Amy couldn’t breathe, she’d expected to see normal little Cream there to visit, but when she opened the door she found herself looking at Cream’s middle instead, and when she looked up she saw that Cream had suddenly grown to her size, a whole 7 inches taller. “C-Cream? How, what, I thought you were back to normal?!”

“I was Amy!” Cream giggled, “Can Cheese and I come in please?”

“Uh…sure…” Amy couldn’t help herself from using her hand to try and get a rough measurement comparison as Cream walked by, and sure enough her hand was at the same level. “What the heck?”

Cream giggled again as she glanced at Cheese and put her finger to her mouth to shush Cheese, then she closed her eyes for just a moment and grew a few more inches while Amy’s back was turned. “I think I’m bigger than Mr. Sonic now!” She whispered. Then she turned around to face Amy who had just closed the door and was walking towards her in silent shock. “So Amy, I was wondering if I could ask you for some advice.”

“Advice?” Amy blinked and then shook her head and smiled. “Sure Cream, sure. Advice on whaaaaaaaaa…?”

“What’s the matter?”

Amy suddenly found herself looking UP at Cream, the 6 year old girl had grown AGAIN while she was closing the door! “Cream, you grew again!”

“You noticed?” Cream began to giggle again, she hadn’t pulled many pranks in her life but this one was so much fun, Amy made the funniest faces when she was confused. “That’s what I wanted to tell you about!” She closed her eyes again and again she began to grow, earning a shocked gasp from the pink hedgehog that she now only figuratively looked up to. By the time Cream decided to stop growing, she had passed 6 feet tall and was over twice Amy’s size. “I can grow whenever I want now! Isn’t that amazing?”

“Uhhhhh…I uh…” Amy shook her head and tried to get her mind in order. “Yeah I guess…can…can you SHRINK too?”

Cream nodded. “Smaller!” She slowly began to shrink down, and she stopped once she was back to Amy’s height. “See?”

“Is that as small as you can get or something?”

“No, I just like being big! And this way I don’t have to hurt my neck to see you.”

“Gotcha…” Amy turned her head and found a chair, and she took a seat before trying to talk again. “Well, I assume this has something to do with everything that happened earlier?”

“Yep! You saw me?”

Amy breathed out a chuckle. “Cream the whole WORLD saw you! Do you have any idea how BIG you were?”

Cream nodded excitedly. “I sure do!” She used her hand to show Amy how small Earth was just like she did for her mother. “Earth was only this big compared to me! And do you know what Tails told me?”

“Uh no…what?”

“That even as big as I was, I was still really small compared to the rest of the universe, that means there’s a lot of room for me to just keep growing bigger and bigger and bigger!”

“Yeah…I suppose he’s right…” Amy shrugged helplessly. “But you DO know you can’t grow that big and still be on Earth right?”

Cream nodded vigorously, “Oh yes! I would always be very careful to make sure no one gets hurt because of my size! I only grew that big earlier to save Earth from Dr. Eggman’s mean old Death Egg! I still want to be able to be with my family and friends, like you Amy! You’re my BEST friend!”

Even as bewildered as she was, Amy couldn’t help but smile at that, “Well you’re my best friend too Cream, you’re just a lot bigger than I’m used to now. Are you going to grow again?”

Cream thought for a moment. “No, not yet. Growing and being big is fun, but I still want to be able to do everything I could before I grew too, so I’ll eventually go back to normal size.”

“You say that like it’s normal for you…” Amy mumbled to herself, “And here I was hoping I could use that ray myself.”

“You want to grow bigger too?”

Amy’s eyes widened and she blushed. She forget how good Cream’s hearing was. “Um yeah, but…but not ALL of me…just…um…”

Cream tilted her head to the side, and then she saw what Amy was looking at. “Oh! You wanted to make your chest bigger?”
112321121121112111111211121121112.title: Asking for advice

choices: Cream runs into someone else on the way there
1123211211211121111112111211211122.content:
Amy blushed deeper. “You can’t tell ANYONE Cream.”

The 6 year old smiled. “Don’t worry, I won’t! I’m sure it’ll grow by itself soon Amy, just like I don’t need my new powers to eventually grow too!”

Amy knew that Cream meant that to be comforting, but she still felt uncomfortable, so she changed the subject. “Never mind my chest. You said you needed advice?”

“Oh yeah!” The bigger rabbit exclaimed. “Well, Tails doesn’t know that his experiments gave me these size powers, and I wanted to ask you how I can find a way to convince him to let me keep them once I tell him. I think he might get scared when I do.”

“That’s a tall order,” Amy made a face when Cream started laughing. “No pun intended.” She got back to the issue at hand. “Well, tell me about your time with Tails, did he enjoy you growing as much as you did?”

“Sometimes he did, sometimes he didn’t. He was very worried for me when I started growing without the Growinator helping me, but as soon as I gave him a big hug and kiss he was ok with it!”

Amy laughed. “So that’s why Sonic was teasing him earlier.” She shook her head in amusement. “Well it seems to me that that’s your answer right there, just do what you did before and you’ll convince him that your growing and shrinking powers are good!”

“YEAH!” Cream exclaimed. “You’re right Amy, I just have to show him some big love! Thank you so much Amy, I can’t wait to see Tails now!”

“You’re welcome Cream.” Amy stood up and walked over to Cream, who was totally eye to eye with her instead of shorter like in her normal size. “You can grow as big as you want, whenever you want, that must be awesome.”

“It is.” Cream beamed at her “big” sister. “Would you like to know what it feels like to be hugged by someone so big?”

“Um…ok.”

Cream nodded and smiled softly, wrapping her arms around Amy in a big hug…and then the hug started to get bigger as she started growing. “Here we go.”

Amy watched in awe as Cream started rising higher and higher, and soon she found herself being lifted off the ground as Cream picked her up and held her in her arms like a little child. “I…haven’t been held like this since I was a baby…”

“Really?”

“Yeah…I haven’t seen my mom in a long time, I’m not even sure where she is.” She snuggled into Cream’s growing torso. “But I remember when she used to hold me like this, I always felt so safe.”

“Yeah, when Mommy holds me I feel safe too.” When Cream felt her ears touch the ceiling, she finally stopped growing and held Amy closer to her body. The pink hedgehog was now about the size of a newborn baby to her, and she held her as such, with tender loving care. “Do you like this?”

Amy nodded into Cream’s torso. “It brings back a lot of memories…” after a few more moments, she pushed back and looked up into Cream’s huge face. “But I think that’s enough now, put me down and shrink back to normal.”

Cream smiled and nodded, and after allowing her “big” sister to hop down from her arms, she concentrated on shrinking and soon found herself back to her normal 2 foot 4 inch size. “I’m glad I could make you happy Amy.”

“Now let me give YOU a hug!”

Before Cream could react, she was suddenly smothered by Amy who was now bigger than her again and had picked her up and wrapped her into a bear hug. “Hey!” She giggled as Amy squeezed her.

“Had to return the favor,” Amy put her down and grinned at her, “After all, no matter how big you get, you’ll always be my little sister! And you know how much I love my little sister!”

Cream laughed as Amy briefly tickled her belly, then she called for Cheese who had made himself at home in Amy’s kitchen. “Thank you so much for everything Amy, I’ll see you later!”

“Bye Cream, and thank you too!” Amy waved as Cream ran out the door with Cheese in tow, and she sighed in contentment and wrapped her arms around herself as the warm feeling of Cream’s hug brought her back into her memories. “You’re a lucky guy Tails, there really isn’t anything Cream wouldn’t do to make her friends happy…I know she made MY day.”

Back with Cream, she had started flying off towards Tails’ workshop, much to Cheese’s surprise. “Chao chao?”

“I know we have to be home for dinner, but it’s only 2 o clock, and hugging Amy gave me a really nice idea!”

“Chao?”

“Trust me, I think we’ll all like it, but if we’re going to have time for it, we need to get to his workshop faster…BIGGER!” Cream suddenly grew twice her size in a matter of seconds, her determined shout increasing the speed of her growth. A few seconds later, Cream had grown to over 30 feet tall, over 10 times Amy’s height. “Now that I’m this big, we should get to Tails workshop in no time! I can’t wait!”
1123211211211121111112111211211122.title: Time for that advice

11232112112111211111121112112111222.content:
At 30 feet tall, it only took minutes for Cream to fly to Tails workshop, then once she was close enough, she focused on shrinking down to her regular size so she wouldn’t freak Tails out right away. “Are you ready Cheese?”

The chao shrugged. “Chao chao chao, chao chao chao chao.”

“Well…that is true, I guess it’s only ME that needs to be ready, you didn’t get any growing power…” Cream sighed as she landed in front of the door and raised her fist to knock. “Well, here goes nothing!”

She knocked, and about a minute later, Tails opened the door and smiled when he saw Cream there. “Hi Cream, what are you doing here?”

Cream smiled back and giggled, “Well I wanted to see you, and I also have something important to tell you.”

“Important?”

“Mhmm,” She nodded. “And I hope you’ll think it’s a good thing. May we come in?”

Tails smiled and gestured indoors. “Of course you can!” He let her pass, blushing a little when she got on her tip toes to give him a little peck on the cheek. “Hehehehe…” He closed the door and rubbed at where her lips just were, “So what’s up?”

“Well…it’s about what happened earlier these past 2 days.”

“Oh?” Tails tilted his head, “In what way?”

The 6 year old rabbit scuffed her shoe against the floor, her hands held behind her back. “You know how we used the Growinator on me so much?”

Tails smile started to vanish, he had a bad feeling where this was going. “Yeah…”

“Well…something happened to me.” Cream closed her eyes, and she felt the now familiar sensation of growing overtake her. She only grew for a second, but it was enough for her to reach Tails height, about 3 inches taller than usual. “The Growinator gave me the power to grow AND shrink whenever I want…isn’t that amazing?”
11232112112111211111121112112111222.title: Showing Tails the results of his experiment

choices: Tails relaxes, Cream is so warm and cozy
Tails keeps resisting, he's got to fix this!
112321121121112111111211121121112221.content:
But Tails wasn’t smiling, “Oh no…” He started to panic, “Oh no oh no oh no oh no oh no! I can’t believe this!” He ran over to the parked Growinator and began analyzing the wires immediately. “This can’t happen, don’t worry Cream I’ll fix this!”

Suddenly Tails found himself being hugged from behind, and he froze as he recognized Cream’s embrace. “Cream what are you…?”

“It’s ok Tails,” She whispered in his ear. “This is a GOOD thing!”

“Good thing?! But…”

She shushed in his ear, and slowly began to increase in size, sitting down as she placed him in her expanding lap. “You’ve given me the best present EVER!” She said as she grew to three times his size. “And I’m going to use it to help everyone I can, INCLUDING YOU.” She gently placed a kiss on the top of his head even as she grew bigger, and she pressed him closer to her body, surrounding him with her warmth. “I love you Tails, you’ve made me so happy. I want to make YOU happy too.”

“I…uh…” Tails was starting to lose concentration. With Cream getting bigger and bigger, and her hug doing the same thing, the warmth and comfort of being surrounded by someone he cared about was messing with his mind.

She topped out at 30 feet tall again, the fox in her lap was tiny compared to her. She leaned down to be closer to him as well as pressing him closer to her, as if she were hugging a small doll. “This is so cozy, I wish I could do this ALL the time.”
112321121121112111111211121121112221.title: Tails freaks out

choices: Cream is growing in her sleep
1123211211211121111112111211211122211.content:
Tails said nothing, although he did find himself leaning back into her embrace, his eyes closed as the softness of her dress and her belly underneath it relaxed him. “This isn’t fair you know.”

“What’s not fair?”

“You’re using your size to manipulate me…and what’s worse is it’s working.”

“Manipulate?”

“It means to get what you want by tricking or fooling me.”

“Oh.” She shook her head, “I don’t want to manipulate you Tails, I just want to show you why my being able to grow is a good thing! Think of all the people I can help by being able to be big whenever I need to. All I have to do is concentrate.”

“I mean…yeah, I guess you have a point.”

“Of course I do.” Cream smiled and moved Tails from her lap, standing him up. Then she shrunk back down to normal and walked up to him. “And when I’m done being big, I can shrink back to normal size. You see? It’s a really good thing you did!”

Tails sighed and looked away for a moment, running his hand through his fur. Finally he eyeballed her, “Ok Cream…I’ll let you keep your new power on just a trial basis. If things start going wrong, I’m gonna work on a way to get rid of it.”

Cream nodded in understanding, “Okay, I guess that’s a good deal. Thank you Tails.” She hugged him again, this time having to lean up to get her arms around his neck, and after a moment he returned the gesture with his own hug. “Hey Tails?”

“Yeah?”

“Is it OK if we do something?”

“Depends on what it is.”

“Well…” She said slowly. “I’m really tired after all this, and I could use a nap. Could we take a nap together please? I just know I’d sleep better with you with me.”

“Seriously?” Tails voice squeaked and he blushed. “I-I mean…sure I guess, as long as it’s JUST SLEEPING.”

Cream pulled back and tilted her head in confusion at her genius boyfriend. “What else would you do in a bed?”

Tails blinked and shook his hands. “Never mind.” He cleared his throat and led her into another room, where he kept a custom sized bed that was normally just for him even though it looked like it could hold 8 of him. “If you don’t mind, we could uh…use this.”

“Of course!” Cream beamed and jumped in the bed, and then she started jumping on the bed. “This bed is so much fun! Look how high I can jump!”

Tails laughed, “Glad you like it.” He followed her into the bed, only laying over the covers so he wouldn’t be invading personal space. “Well…um, goodnight Cream, I guess…” He rolled over awkwardly and tried to close his eyes as his head hit the pillow.

What he didn’t expect was to feel Cream spooning against his back. “Cream?”

“Just hang on Tails, please?” She wrapped her arms around his waist as she snuggled up to him, then as expected, she began to grow again, bigger and bigger until she was about 7 feet tall. “I wanted to grow so I could hug you like this. Do you like it?”

Tails was just blushing, he couldn’t even talk. “Uh…” He almost bit his tongue when Cream started growing again briefly, now up to 10 feet tall with her feet almost hanging over the edge. “Are you going to get any bigger?”

Cream slowly shook her head, already falling to her fatigue as she hugged Tails close. “This is big enough for what I wanted to do, I wanted to have you close to me, and make you feel how much I love you.”

Tails couldn’t help but smile even as he blushed. “I love you too Cream.” He snuggled into her, finally accepting her size and even allowing himself to enjoy it as her huge size was perfect for cuddling. “This feels so nice,” he thought to himself. “I wish I could have Cream with me when I go to bed tonight, I’d sleep like a baby.” He briefly turned to look at the clock, “2:30…I think we can spare a couple of hours to just sleep.” As he snuggled his face into her arm and used his legs to wrap around her arm like a full body pillow, Tails sighed in contentment and slowly drifted off to sleep himself. “Goodnight Cream, sweet dreams.”

What happens next?
1123211211211121111112111211211122211.title: Maybe this isn't so bad...

choices: Tails is currently working on another brand new invention
Nope, just some old chores that need to get done
11232112112111211111121112112111222112.content:
It was a little over 2 hours later that Cream’s eyes fluttered open after her nap, and the first thing that came to her mind was that she’d just had the best nap of her life. She blinked slowly and looked down, a soft and loving smile on her face. Tails had turned around and was now snuggling into her chest, which while she was 10 feet tall, there was plenty of it to snuggle into. “I guess I was able to make Tails happy after all.”

She then noticed that above Tails head, Cheese had apparently joined them sometime while she was asleep, and now he too was taking a cozy nap with them. “You’ve really enjoyed me being big Cheese,” She giggled quietly. “But I don’t NEED to grow to hold YOU in my arms. I’ll hug you when we go to bed tonight.”

Since she had some time as Tails clearly didn’t look like he was going to wake up anytime soon, the huge 6 year old took some time to think. “So much has happened these past 2 days. I went to Twinkle Park, got a boyfriend, saved the world, got the power to grow, and took a nap with my new boyfriend.” She smiled down at Tails again, who had a happy smile on his face as he quietly snored. “No wonder Amy wants Mr. Sonic to love her so much, having someone who loves you like this is the best feeling in the whole world!”

Cream placed her lips on Tails head, and she smiled when she heard him sigh after the contact and he snuggled even closer. “I hope one day we’ll be able to be together forever Tails, but that’s a long time from now…I can wait though, Amy told me that if you fell in love you would need to have patience, this must be what she meant.”

Just then, Tails eyes fluttered open, and he yawned as he fought the sleep away. It sure helped that he felt a pair of giant arms gently hugging him to an even bigger torso. “So…it wasn’t a dream, heh heh.”

“Nope! It’s all real.” Cream kissed his head again, causing the fox boy to blush and look away bashfully. “That was a REALLY nice nap.”

“Yeah it was, I don’t usually take naps, but I guess there are always exceptions.” Tails looked up and smiled at the big bunny, whose brown eyes were sparkling down at him. “You’re really warm you know?”

“Thanks.” Cream giggled and finally got out of the bed, shrinking back down to normal as she did so. “I’m glad you enjoyed it as much as I did.”

Tails also got out of the bed, careful not to wake Cheese since he was still sleeping. “So when do you have to go Cream?”

“I just have to be home in time for dinner, so I still have a couple of hours to have fun with you here.” Cream walked over to her young boyfriend and beamed up at him, “So, are you working on any new projects that I can help with?”
11232112112111211111121112112111222112.title: What should we do next?

choices: “You can help me drink the lemonade that’s in my refrigerator!"
"You can help me with a new project I just thought of!"
112321121121112111111211121121112221122.content:
Tails laughed and shook his head. “The only new project I have is the Growinator, and I think I could use a break from THAT particular experiment.” He scratched his chin in thought, “Although I do have a few older projects that you could probably help me with.”

Cream giggled and stood up straight, giving a salute. “I’m here and ready to help!”

The fox boy laughed again, “Ok then, follow me.” Tails led his little again girlfriend into the hangar bay, where his old planes were parked. The original Tornado had parts hanging out of it, and that’s where Tails went. “The ol’ Tornado’s been banged up again, so I’ve been working on fixing it in my spare time. The Tornado 2 is doing a good job, but it doesn’t hurt to have a spare.”

Cream nodded, “That sounds like a good idea.”

Tails nodded back, “So here’s what I want you to do, I want you to hand me tools while I work on the plane, I’ll try and explain them to you as best I can.”

“Ok!” Cream watched as Tails laid on a small rolling cart and went underneath the plane and got to work. “So what do you need?”

“First hand me a wrench.”

Cream looked around and eventually found a wrench, and she handed it to her boyfriend under the plane. “Like this?”

“Perfect!”

And so it went, whatever tool Tails asked for, Cream would eagerly hand it to him. But as time went on, Tails requests got more and more complicated, and the poor girl was having a hard time figuring out what he wanted.

“You want a what?”

Tails sighed and rolled out from underneath the plane, grabbing the tool he needed and showing it to her. “This is a wire stripper.”

“Oh…I didn’t know…”

Tails frowned when he saw her wilt a little in disappointment, “Hey don’t feel bad,” he took her hand in his, “You’re being a big help, so relax.”

Cream blushed just a little and looked up at him through her eyelashes. “Thank you Tails.” She said quietly. Then her eyes widened and a smile spread across her face. “I think I can REALLY be a big help to you!”

“Uh…what’d you have in mind?” He got his answer when Cream started growing, up and up until she was so big that the Tornado was about the size of her fist, of course she had to kneel down to fit in the hangar. She stopped growing there and gently took hold of the plane, using her hands to hold it sideways. “Wow…”

“There we go!” Cream beamed down at Tails, “Now YOU can get whatever tools you need right away, AND you don’t have to work on your back anymore!”

“Well, yeah…but won’t you get tired from holding the plane?”

Cream shook her head, “Don’t worry about it, at this size the plane isn’t that heavy, I just need to focus on holding it steady for you. And if it DOES start getting heavy, I’ll just grow a little more and make it lighter!”

“Well ok then,” Tails smirked, “But don’t get TOO MUCH bigger, you’re already on your knees and I don’t think there’s much more room in here for you to grow. Taking a break isn’t a bad thing.”

The giant bunny nodded, “Ok Tails.”

With Cream holding the plane sideways, work went much faster as Tails was able to get whatever tools he needed much quicker and didn’t have to struggle with confined space. Within 15 minutes, the plane was fixed, and Tails closed it up with a satisfied sigh. “Done and done, ok Cream, put it down!”

With a smile and a nod, Cream gently rotated the plane and placed it back on the ground, the she shrunk back to normal and cheered, hopping up and down in glee. “We did it! I just KNEW my being big would be a good thing! I can help ANYONE now!”

Tails just smiled and shook his head in amusement, Cream got so excited about helping people that it was just too cute and endearing. “Well Cream, if you’re willing, there is one more thing I’d like your help with, and you can be normal sized to do it.”

“Really?” Cream stopped jumping and looked at Tails. “What’s that?”
112321121121112111111211121121112221122.title: A BIG help

choices: Tails and Cream decide to spend some more time together
Brice breaks in and attacks Tails
1123211211211121111112111211211122211221.content:
“You can help me drink the lemonade that’s in my refrigerator, I think we’ve earned a reward after all that hard work.”

Cream grinned and hopped over to Tails, grabbing his hand and blinking up at him with eyes wide with affection. “I think so too!”

They walked over to the kitchen and Tails got 2 glasses and poured some lemonade into them…but little did they know, that while they enjoyed their refreshment, a spy had just arrived to look in on them.

“Orbot to Dr. Eggman, come in doctor!”

“What it is you duncebucket?!”

Orbot flinched at the angry tone. “I’m reporting that both Tails and the rabbit girl are back in his workshop, she seems to have shrunken back to her normal small size!”

“Really?” Eggman chortled. “Well then, it seems that her enlarged size was only temporary, which means the time to strike is NOW!”

“What should I do Doctor?”

“You get back here before they see you, I have a NEW plan that no one will be able to stop! Now that the blasted bunny is no longer the size of the SUN, my newest creation will be unstoppable!”

“It does seem strange though Doctor, how did she get so big so fast?”

“That’s no longer of any importance, now that she’s back to her normal puny size, she’s no threat to me. Return to base NOW or I’ll dismantle you!”

Orbot gulped, “Y-yes Doctor!”

The red spherical robot zoomed off and left the very young couple alone…except for the other spy that had been looking through a different window unnoticed.

“So, that stupid bunny is small now huh? Well I guess that means I can get my revenge after all! I hope you’re ready MILEY, you and your little, teeny-weeny girlfriend are gonna learn not to mess with ME!”
1123211211211121111112111211211122211221.title: Snack time...but wait, who's outside?

1123211211211121111112111211211122211221.content: (Yeah I know, but I wanted to leave the door open for someone else to decide what they'd do. So here you go, don't waste it!)
1123211211211121111112111211211122211221.title: Choices

choices: Cream can't help it, she REALLY wants to grow and cuddle!
1123211211211121111112111211211122211221.content:
After Cream’s size changing power made quick work out of fixing the Tornado, the young couple found themselves with about an hour and a half of time to kill before Cream had to head back home for dinner.

“So what should we do now?” Cream asked as she finished her lemonade.

The fox boy took one last swig of his own refreshment before taking on a thoughtful expression. “Well, I don’t have anymore work to do today, thanks to you.” He smiled when Cream giggled bashfully at the compliment. “Maybe we can watch a quick movie?”

“That sounds like fun!”

Tails nodded, and he took Cream’s hand and led her back to his workshop, stopping right in front of his huge computer monitor. “Alright, just stand there a second.” He went over to his computer console and pressed a button, and out of the floor, much to Cream’s surprise, came a large couch that was big enough to hold at least four people.

“Wow Tails, when did you make this?” Cream asked.

“What, you think I just work 24/7?” Tails smirked as he pressed a few more keys on his keyboard. “This isn’t just my workshop, this is also my movie theater, my video game room, I can make it anything I need!”

“That’s so amazing! When did you find the time to do all this?”

“I found the time to make a GROWTH RAY Cream. I’ll let you in on a little secret, I had no idea what I was going to do with it until I was almost finished, I originally started building it just for the sake of the challenge.”

“But then you thought you could make people happy by making their food bigger? Oh Tails, that’s just so nice of you, can I go with you when you go on your mission? I’d really like to see the smiles on everyone’s faces!”

“Absolutely! I wouldn’t have it any other way!” Tails finally pulled up the movie of choice, and he dimmed the lights and hopped onto the couch, patting the spot next to him as the beginning credits started to play on the screen. “Well come on, half of the fun is going to come from us cuddling together, right?”

Cream blushed and she smiled widely, nodding as she crawled up onto the couch and snuggled up to her boyfriend.

Then she closed her eyes and once again started to grow.

“Ah ah ah!” At Tails voice, Cream’s eyes shot open and she stopped growing after only gaining about a foot in height. “Not this time, shrink back down and just relax, this time I wanna make YOU happy, just trust me.”

“Well, ok.” Cream obliged and shrunk back down to normal. She was going to place him in her lap and cuddle him that way once she was big enough, but apparently Tails had other plans.

“That’s better.” Tails smiled. “Now, MY turn to cuddle YOU.” He wrapped his arm around her shoulder and pulled her closer to him so that there was almost no room between them. Then he did something Cream never would’ve expected.

“Tails…”

The fox boy had wrapped his tails around her, and then leaned in and wrapped his other arm around her so that she was totally cocooned and they were as close to each other as they could get. “Is that comfy?”

“Mhmm.” Cream blushed with a soft smile, snuggling her face into the fur of his tails. “They’re so soft, they would make great pillows I think.”

“I don’t think anyone’s ever told me that before.” Tails chuckled. After that, the two sat back and quietly enjoyed the showing of ‘The King and the Beggar,’ happily cuddling together and enjoying each other’s company.
1123211211211121111112111211211122211221.title: How about a movie?

choices: Cream is determined to go save Cheese!
Someone's at the door - what horrible timing!
1123211211211121111112111211211122211221.content:
But what they didn’t know was that someone had managed to sneak past them during their time of blissfully innocent affection.

“Alright Miley, you just enjoy that stupid little rabbit and I’LL enjoy snooping around for something I can use to get my revenge.”

Brice was able to slink around Tails house unnoticed, but no matter where he went he wasn’t able to find anything even remotely useful. “You’d think with all the junk he has around here he’d leave behind SOMETHING cool.”

Though he was frustrated from not finding anything useful, the large fox continued his search and eventually found himself in his bedroom.

And that was when his eyes caught onto something that prompted the bully to smirk evilly. “Well well well, what do we have here?”

An hour or so later, the movie ended, and Tails and Cream somehow found themselves unwilling to move from their very cozy positions. “I REALLY like cuddling with you Tails, it feels so nice to be loved like this, now I know why Amy wants Mr. Sonic to do the same to HER.”

Tails smiled and gave her a tight squeeze before loosening it again. “I’ll tell you a secret, and you can’t tell anyone…but I think Sonic actually DOES like her.”

“Really?”

“Yep,” he nodded, “He’s just too shy to admit it.”

“I’m glad YOU’RE not shy Tails,” She snuggled into the fluffy fur of his tails and sighed. “This is just soooooo nice. If you were shy like Mr. Sonic then we wouldn’t get to do this.”

“You’re probably right.” Tails blushed and rubbed the back of his neck. “Just remember, that’s our little secret, you can’t tell Amy or anyone else what I just told you.”

Cream nodded with a smile. “I promise I won’t tell anyone…so next time we do this, I get to cuddle YOU right? We can take turns!”

“Oh really?”

Cream nodded excitedly, her ears bobbing up and down. “Now that I can grow as big as I want, I can give you great big hugs and kisses and we can be really happy together!”

Tails laughed and blushed at that. “Well, we’ll save that for another time. For now, I think you better get Cheese and head home for dinner before your mom gets upset.”

“Yeah, good idea.” Cream headed to the bedroom while Tails cleaned up his lab and turned back it into a lab, but then seconds later, “TAILS COME QUICK!”

The fox boy blanched and he ran to the bedroom where he saw Cream sobbing over a piece of paper that was on his bed. “What happened?!”

“Cheese has been kidnapped!”
1123211211211121111112111211211122211221.title: Chaonapped!

choices: Stealth and guile, get small and sneak up on him
Direct approach, get huge and take Cheese back
1123211211211121111112111211211122211221.content:
Tails read the note over and over, the frown on his face deepening every time he did so. “I kidnapped your blue pet, I said I wanted revenge and now I’ve got it. Good luck trying to find me, you’ll need it. Signed Brice.”

“What are we going to do Tails?! Cheese needs our help!” Cream shouted through her tears.

“I’m thinking I’m thinking…” Tails paced back and forth for a second and read the note again, his eyes widening when he spotted the extra note below where Brice had signed the letter. “P.S., got revenge on your little girlfriend for embarrassing me too.”

“Revenge on ME?”

“Yeah,” Tails huffed. “Apparently he didn’t appreciate you blowing him away when you were big, so he saw you while you were normal and decided to take Cheese as revenge on us both.”

“Well I can get big whenever I want now! We have to go save Cheese before that mean bully hurts him!”

Cream was about to run outside when Tails grabbed her by the wrist and stopped her. “We’ll find him Cream, don’t worry, but first there’s some stuff we have to take care of, like telling your mom what happened.”

“Oh…right.”

Tails went over to his phone and dialed Vanilla’s number, and as soon as he explained that Cheese had been kidnapped and that they were going to go find him, Vanilla made sure to let them know to be careful and for Cream to come home as soon as they saved Cheese.

“So is it all taken care of?”

Tails hung up and nodded at the young rabbit. “Yeah, except for one thing.” Tails then headed back to the hangar where his planes were, and he got into the Tornado 2 and started the engine. “Get in, I have a feeling I know where to start looking.”

Cream nodded and hopped into the back of the plane, and moments later the hangar opened and the Tornado 2 shot through the sky towards its destination.

Meanwhile, a very angry and sweaty Brice was making his way through a nearby jungle, dragging a kicking and screaming chao the whole way. “Will you cut it out?! They’ll never find us here! People have been getting lost in this jungle for years!”

“Chao!”

“Huh?” Brice looked up and he saw a large purple cat with a frog on his shoulder looking at them. “What are YOU looking at?”

“Isn’t that Cream’s friend Cheese?” The cat asked.

“Uh yeah, sure, I’m just taking it for a walk.”

“Chao chao chao chao chao!” Cheese shook his head furiously.

“Oh, ok then. Say hi to Cream for me!”

“Oh I will!” Brice watched the cat and his frog walk away with his fishing pole slung over his other shoulder. “Boy is he dumb.”
Brice then dragged the terrified chao into a small path within the trees, and then he hid the path with branches. “Well, that should keep Miley and your little friend from finding us. Now I just gotta find out what to do with you.”

Cheese just whimpered in fear.

Meanwhile, Tails and Cream had reached the Mystic Ruins jungle, and he landed the plane in the middle of a clearing. “What are we doing here Tails?” Cream asked.

“We’re going to find Brice here, he used to take me to a certain hole in the jungle and come up with new ways to bully me. The last time he ever bullied me was the day I met Sonic, I followed him after Brice was done with me for the day and since I made friends with Sonic, I never had problems with Brice again, until now.”

“And you think he took Cheese there?” Cream gulped.

“Brice isn’t as smart as he thinks he is.” Tails grimaced as he pressed a button on his console, “Get out Cream!”

The urgency in his voice got Cream to hurry, and she hopped out just on time to see the plane start to shift and change. “Wow!”

“Tornado transformation!” The plane transformed into a battle tank right before their eyes. “Cyclone engaged! Brice wants to play rough? Let’s see how big and bad he is NOW!”

Cream nodded and closed her eyes a moment, concentrating on growing until she was about the same size as the Cyclone. “Let’s go save Cheese!”
The two young people stomped through the jungle, intent on finding their small blue friend and their fox bully.

“Hi Cream! Hi Tails!”

The two stopped in their tracks and saw their friend Big the Cat waving at them. “Hello Mr. Big! I’m very sorry we can’t stay and talk right now, we have to hurry and save Cheese from a mean bully!”

“Oh, ok. Hey, weren’t you a lot bigger earlier?”

“Yes she was, now if you’ll excuse us.” Tails was about to get going again, but then he stopped again and looked at Big. “You didn’t happen to see a fox carrying Cheese away did you?”

“Yeah, he went that way.” Big pointed into the jungle.

Tails growled, “I was right.” He nodded at the large purple cat. “Thanks Big, come on Cream.”

“So how’d you get so big Cream?”

Cream whimpered anxiously for a moment. “Mr. Big, I’ll gladly tell you everything as soon as we save Cheese! But for now, may we please go?”

“Oh yeah! Sorry. Good luck!” Big waved and went on his merry way, leaving the young couple to themselves.

“He means well but…sheesh.” Tails sighed and looked to Cream, “Ok Cream, take this again.” He handed the girl the radio she’d used before and watched her put it in her ear. “We’re about to find Brice, so we have a plan.”

“We do?”

What is the plan?
1123211211211121111112111211211122211221.title: Rescue Mission

1123211211211121111112111211211122211221.content:
“I’m going to take the front side and get his attention, and we’re going to test a theory I have about your new powers.”

“What theory is that?”

“We already know you can grow and you can shrink back to normal, but now we need to find out if you can shrink down even SMALLER.”

“You want me to be small?” Cream frowned a little bit at the thought. “I don’t think I’d like that very much.”

Tails gave her a pointed look. “If you can shrink down small enough to sneak up on Brice while I keep him busy, then you can grow again and save Cheese and we won’t even have to risk anyone getting hurt.”

“That DOES sound like a good plan.” Cream sighed and nodded reluctantly at her boyfriend. “Ok Tails, I’ll try.” She closed her eyes and concentrated, and seconds later she felt the sensation of shrinking come over her. “It feels a lot different than growing.”

“Keep it up Cream, I’ll get you into the right position.” By now Cream was small enough to fit in his palm, and he picked her up and placed her on the dashboard even as she continued shrinking down. “That should be enough.”

Cream’s eyes snapped open, and she gasped in shock as she looked around. “So this is what I must look like to you whenever I get big.”

“Something like that.” He maneuvered the Cyclone in front of the hidden pathway. “Once I get Brice’s attention, you need to fly past him and get behind him so we can catch him by surprise. Then it’ll all be over before you know it.”

“Good, poor Cheese must be so scared!”

Tails nodded in satisfaction, happy that Cream was apparently now focused on saving Cheese rather than how weird it felt to be small. Then he screwed on a determined expression and drove the tank through the branches, and moments later he found Brice, apparently startled by his sudden appearance. “Brice!”

“Gah! Miley? What are YOU doing here?!”

“Stop calling me Miley!” Tails made the Cyclone take another step forward as a threat, “Did you really think I wouldn’t remember this little hidden torture chamber of yours? I know ALL your hiding spots!”

The larger fox growled and grabbed Cheese, “Here to save your little girlfriend’s pet huh? Well guess what? You can’t have it! I don’t care what kind of crazy tank you have, you gonna shoot me or something?”

“Don’t do anything stupid Brice, give us Cheese before you do something you’ll regret.”

Brice missed the slight nod that Tails made, and he shook his head defiantly. “You don’t scare me MILEY, you don’t have the guts to actually shoot at me, and your girlfriend isn’t here to help you this time. And even if she was, I saw her, she’s really just a shrimpy little thing anyway, whatever happened earlier was just a weird fluke!”

“Is that what you think?”

Brice turned around suddenly and saw Cream standing there, at her normal height and looking very upset. “Oh, so you ARE here. Well whatever, what are YOU gonna do pipsqueak?”

Unfortunately for Brice, he got his answer when Cream suddenly started growing, within seconds she was his size and seconds later she was twice his size.
And she was still growing.

“Y-You can’t…but that’s not…you’re supposed to be small!”

Cream didn’t stop growing until the trees only reached her waist, and then she picked up the panicking bully and glared at him. “I told you Mr. Brice, my friends would be safe from bullies like you as long as I’m around! Now give Cheese back before I get REALLY angry!”

“I can’t believe this is happening!”

“Believe it jerk.” Tails hovered up in his flying tank with a laser cannon sticking out the front. “If Cream isn’t convincing you herself, maybe THIS will. Believe it or not I have a stun setting on my laser cannon, but it’ll hurt A LOT. Wanna know how it feels getting beat on?”

Looking back and forth between the two, Brice growled and let Cheese go, and the chao immediately fluttered up to his now giant owner and hovered there. “There, you got your blue puff ball back, now put me down!”

But instead of doing that, Cream brought Brice right up to her enormous face, glaring at him with an anger she’d never felt before. “Mr. Brice, that’s twice now you’ve tried to hurt my friends, doing it a third time would be a very bad idea. You think I’m big now? I can get MUCH bigger, and I don’t think you want that, do you?”

The bully fox gulped and shook his head, “No way.”

“Then promise right now that you’ll leave us alone! Forever and ever, and you’ll keep your friends away from us too!”

“Ok ok I promise! Please put me down!” Brice was almost immediately placed back on the ground, and he ran off in utter fear. “I give up! I’m going to learn how to make macaroni sculptures!”

Once Brice was gone, Cream shrank back to normal and cheered. “We did it!” She hugged her little blue friend tightly. “Oh Cheese are you ok? Did he hurt you?”

“Chao chao.” Cheese smiled and shook his head.

“Oh thank goodness.” Cream then turned to Tails who was happily watching the scene take place from the Cyclone. “Thank you so much Tails, we make a great team!”

“You said it.” He then looked at the dashboard and pointed into the distance, “The sun’s setting Cream, you better hurry up and get home, your dinner is probably cold by now.”

“Oh you’re right, we need to go! See you tomorrow Tails!” Growing to 30 feet tall, she took off as fast as she could, her extra size making her go much faster.

“The only way to travel.” Tails chuckled and shook his head in amusement.

Cream and Cheese enjoyed a wonderful dinner courtesy of Vanilla, and they soon went to bed and fell asleep, exhausted from the day’s ordeal.

But that night, little did they know that a new threat would emerge, one that they never could’ve seen coming. “Prepare yourself Sonic the Hedgehog, you won’t survive this time!” Chortled the evil Dr. Eggman.
1123211211211121111112111211211122211221.title: Big plans, small bunny

choices: Cream hears a noise and stops
1123211211211121111112111211211122211221.content:
Cream woke up the next day feeling absolutely fantastic, she stretched out her limbs and opened her eyes with a smile as she looked towards the foot of her bed.

Feeling playful, she grinned and grew a few inches so her feet nearly reached the foot of her bed. “Uh oh, looks like I’ll need a new bed soon!” She said over-dramatically, giggling as she continued her little role play.

Then she grew a little more, and a little more, until finally her feet were hanging over the bed and it was obvious she was too big for it. “I need a big girl bed now, I’m too big for this baby bed.”

She laughed to herself and kept growing,
1123211211211121111112111211211122211221.title: The next day

1123211211211121111112111211211122211221.content:
But she immediately stopped when she heard her bed start to creak under her increased weight. “Oops, I guess I got carried away.” She shrunk back to normal and got out of bed, berating herself for getting careless. “I’ve got to be more careful, like my friends always tell me, having power means having responsibility!”

She went to her closet and changed out of her pajamas, putting on her normal dress and looking at herself in the mirror to make sure she looked presentable. “I wonder why my clothes grow with me all the time. I guess I’ll ask Tails later.”

Moments later, Cheese woke up and hovered next to her, yawning a little as he landed on her shoulder. “Chao chao.”

“Good morning to you too Cheese!” Cream rubbed the chao’s head and smiled when he made a small noise of contentment. “Let’s go see what’s in store for us today!” She hurried down the stairs and saw that her mom was finishing up breakfast, and after an excellent meal of eggs and toast, she hurried outside and flew in the direction of Tails’ workshop.

“Chao chao chao?”

“No, I’m not going to grow to get there this time, sometimes it’s nice to just see everything as they are, when I fly when I’m big, I go too fast to really see it.”

“Chao.”

It took them a while to reach the workshop, but when they finally did, she landed and knocked on the door. “Tails, are you there? It’s me!”
1123211211211121111112111211211122211221.title: Better be careful!

1123211211211121111112111211211122211221.content: It's a your choice chapter, terrible but necessary for the sake of other writers. Who answers?
1123211211211121111112111211211122211221.title: Someone else answers

1123211211211121111112111211211122211221.content:
Moments later the door opened, and Cream was surprised to see it wasn’t Tails that answered. “Oh, hello Mr. Sonic.”

“Well well, if it isn’t the little giant herself.” He gave his usual side grin and stepped aside to let her in. “Come on in, Tails will probably be real happy to see you.”

“Thank you.” She walked past the blue hedgehog and went inside the familiar confines of the workshop, and moments later she saw Tails working on a very familiar device. “Hi Tails.”

The fox boy turned and smiled when he saw her. “Hey Cream.”

“What are you doing with the Growinator?”

“I’m just fine-tuning it.” Tails adjusted a few wires inside the gun. “It gave you size-changing powers by accident, but if it’s gonna do what I wanted it to do in the first place, we need to be ABSOLUTELY sure nothing will go wrong.”

“That makes sense.” She looked over his shoulder as he worked. “Is there anything I can do to help?”

“Not this time, this is very delicate work.” He looked over his shoulder to smile at her a moment. “But if it all goes according to plan, then I’ll need your help later to pack up the food we’re gonna enlarge.”

“We’re going today?!” Cream jumped up and cheered. “I can’t wait!”

“Always excited, eh Cream?” Sonic walked in with a smirk and his arms crossed over his chest. “Gotta say little bro, that blaster ray of yours has done a lot these past few days.”

“Yeah, well, what’s done is done.” Tails blushed a little in embarrassment and focused on his work. “All I wanna do now is make sure this project is ready to go and make a difference in the world.”
1123211211211121111112111211211122211221.title: The Blue Blur is in the house

choices: "I'm going with you no matter what!"
1123211211211121111112111211211122211221.content:
Suddenly, alarms started going off in the workshop. “Now what?!” Sonic exclaimed.

Tails rushed to his computer and activated his surveillance system, and his eyes widened in horror at the sight of giant robots attacking Station Square, along with several smaller robots. “It’s Eggman!”

“Looks like he means business this time!” Sonic clenched his fists and glared at the screen. “Rally the troops Tails, we’re gonna need all the help we can get!”

“Got it!” Tails pressed a few buttons on his console, and alerts were sent to all the members of their team. “Done, let’s go save everyone!”

“Ok!”

Sonic and Tails stopped in their tracks and looked back at Cream and Cheese, who had determined expressions on their faces. “Tails?” Sonic asked.

“You go Sonic, I’ll handle this.” Tails saw him nod and zoom away, and then the fox boy went over to his little girlfriend. “I want you to stay here for now Cream.”

Cream’s face fell in sadness. “What? Why?” She whined miserably.

“Don’t be sad Cream!” He exclaimed. “I have a plan, you’re going to be our secret weapon.”

“Oh?”

“Yeah. Sonic and the rest of us are gonna see what we can do without your help, but if we need your help I’ll call you. The longer we can keep you a secret from Eggman, the better.”

“Well…"
1123211211211121111112111211211122211221.title: Eggman Attack!

1123211211211121111112111211211122211221.content:
She grabbed Tails and hugged him tightly. “Please be careful!”

He hugged her back for a moment before pulling back. “I will, I promise!” He then ran to the hangar and activated the Tornado 2, “Stay alert Cream! If we need you, you’ll have to hurry!”

“I will!” With a nod, Tails took off into the sky in his plane, leaving his young girlfriend behind and already worried. “I hope they’ll be ok.”

“Chao…”

Meanwhile, Sonic had arrived at Station Square, where he was fighting through an army of smaller robots to try and get to the giant ones. “This is crazy, Eggman’s never gone all out like this before!” The blue hedgehog shouted.

“Guess he got tired of listening to you treat him like a moron.” Knuckles slammed his fists into the ground and sent several robots flying into the air, breaking the ground with his amazing strength.

“Less talking, more hitting!” Amy spun in a circle with her hammer outstretched, smacking around robots as she did so. “What are we gonna do about THOSE things?!”

Sonic looked up and growled at the giant robots attacking the city. There were 3 of them, and each one was over 3 times the size of the tallest building in Station Square. Clearly no attack he could use on them would do any damage. “Where are the Chaos Emeralds when ya need ‘em?”

“Do you think G.U.N. might have them?!” Amy asked as she smashed another robot.

Then Tails appeared in the Tornado 2, and he turned it into the Cyclone tank before landing. “What’s up?”

“The small robots are a joke as usual, it’s those big ones that are a problem.” Knuckles replied.

“Well I have an emergency plan if we can’t think of something.” Tails said. “Any sign of Shadow and Rouge?”

“They’re coming too?” Knuckles grumbled. A huge laser blast from one of the robots made him flinch and look back a second. “On second thought, maybe it’d be a good thing if they were here.”

“ATTENTION EVERYONE!”

“Eggman?”

One of the giant robots began bellowing out Eggman’s voice, obviously a large speaker. “This is Dr. Eggman speaking, seeing as I’ve firmly proven myself as the superior power on this planet, I hereby claim this city as the center of Robotnikland! My dream has finally become reality, and there’s nothing that miserable blue hero of yours can do about it!”

“Oh yeah? Hope you’re ready to eat those words!” Sonic revved up a spin dash and attacked. But he merely bounced off the giant robot and bounced back to his friends with a groan. “Not even a scratch.”

The robots then fired at them, and they were able to dodge the blast by sheer luck. “We can’t hold out much longer Tails!” Amy exclaimed worriedly.

“I didn’t wanna do this, but it looks like I have no choice.” He activated his communicator, “Cream, come in Cream!” He never got a chance to hear an answer, as another blast came his way.

“Tails? Tails!” Cream screamed at the computer Tails had contacted her on, but all she got was static. “Oh no, they’re in trouble!”

“Chao chao chao!”

“You’re right Cheese, I have to go help them, I have the power to grow as big as I want, so I’m going to use that power to save my friends!” She ran outside and focused on growing, and within seconds, she was as big as the workshop and still growing. “Hang on everyone, I’m coming to save you!”
1123211211211121111112111211211122211221.title: "Ok."

choices: Cream arrives to act as a BIG distraction
The robots spot the Chaos Emeralds
1123211211211121111112111211211122211221.content:
The battle was close to being over, Sonic and his friends were unable to do anything against Eggman’s monstrous machines, their armor was so thick that even Knuckles wasn’t able to put a dent into it.

“I’m gonna give it everything I’ve got!” Tails unleashed the plane’s most powerful laser cannon at the head of one of the giant robots, but even at full strength, all the blast was able to do was make the robot see Tails and shoot at him with a beam out of its eye that was at least 3 times the diameter of Tails’ attack. “Not a scratch!” He shouted as he piloted the plane to dodge.

“This is useless, nothing we do even puts a dent into them!” Amy exclaimed.

Sonic landed back on the ground on 1 knee after 1 last attempt at spin dashing through the hull. “It’s no good, looks like Eggman pulled out all the stops this time!”

“Guess he’s feeling pretty salty over the fact that he got embarrassed by a 6 year old!” Knuckles was of course referring to when Cream singlehandedly foiled his previous evil plan simply by growing to an unimaginably gigantic size and making the Death Egg totally ineffective.

“Well if Cream were here maybe we’d have a chance of winning, we’d make them pick on someone their own size!” Amy exclaimed.

“I tried to call her, I don’t know if it went through or not, the weapons the robots are using are disrupting long range communication signals.” Tails said, “Besides, I don’t think even Cream would be able to beat back all 3 of those things without becoming a hazard herself, there’s still innocent bystanders to think about. If she gets too big, she may become more dangerous than the robots themselves.”

“Terrific.” Amy sighed.

Just then, out of nowhere, two figures appeared in front of the group, minus Tails who was still circling in the sky in his plane. “Shadow, Rouge?” Sonic said.

“Looks like you’ve run into a big problem eh boys?” Rouge said.

“Excuse me, I’m here too!” Amy shouted.

They ignored her outburst and Tails chimed in via Sonic’s communicator. “Please, I’ve had enough of size puns in the past few days to last a lifetime.”

“Duly noted.” Rouge smirked, although it disappeared when one of the robots fired down on the city again, causing even more destruction. “Either way, we need to do something about this and fast.”

“Well unless you have a plan, either start helping us fight or get lost.” Knuckles growled at the thief who just rolled her eyes in response.

“The plan is simple.” Shadow finally spoke up. “G.U.N. has provided us with the Chaos Emeralds which Sonic and I will use to defeat the robots. But unfortunately, it won’t be that easy.”

“Of course not.” Amy scoffed.

Again she was ignored. Shadow turned to look at the lumbering machines, each one big enough to wipe out a city block in one step. “These machines the good doctor has made are sensitive to large amounts of chaos energy, when we try to transform, the robots will sense the increase in power and shoot at us before we’re finished. I don’t need to tell you what happens to us if they do.”

Another shot gave them all the answer. “So what we need is a distraction!” Tails exclaimed, “And while I don’t wanna make a pun, I think it’s necessary…we need a BIG distraction!”
1123211211211121111112111211211122211221.title: Help has arrived

choices: The blast supercharged her growth, now she's gigantic!
1123211211211121111112111211211122211221.content:
“That’s easy, call that cute little big rabbit friend of yours.” Rouge shrugged dismissively.

“Try to keep up, we already talked about that.” Knuckles grumbled. “Tails can’t contact Cream and even if he could, she’d be more dangerous than the robots.”

“Well can’t we take that risk?” Amy spoke up once more. “If Cream grows big enough that the robots aren’t a threat, couldn’t she just destroy them herself?”

She was finally acknowledged by Shadow. “G.U.N. analysis shows that the robots’ armor is impenetrable by conventional means. For Cream to use her size powers to beat the robots, she would need to be big enough that she could hold them in between her fingers to generate the necessary force, and even that is a rough estimate.”

“And that would be very impractical.” Tails chimed in. “Cream would need to be bigger than the city itself, and that would lead to a whole new set of problems.”

“Then we’re back to Plan A, distracting the robots until Shadow and I can finish the job.” Sonic said. “The only question is how.”

Suddenly the team felt the ground shake a little. “Was that one of the robots?” Amy asked.

“No way, that felt too soft.” Then it was felt again. “And it’s too fast to be one of those things.” Knuckles said.

“It’s Cream!” Tails pointed into the distance, and there was his girlfriend running towards them as fast as she could and at an increased size. “But she’s not big enough!”

It was true, when Cream reached the city, her head was at the height of some of the larger buildings around, but that still only made her reach the robot’s knees. “Uh oh, they’re bigger than I thought they were!” She exclaimed worriedly.

“Chao!”

Meanwhile, Eggman was trying to figure out what was happening as he watched on a televiewer. “You fool, you told me she’d gone back to normal!”

“S-She did Doctor, I swear it on my CPU!” Orbot gulped.

“This is an unforeseen circumstance, clearly the rabbit child has developed some form of size-changing powers, we’ll have to change tactics!” Pressing a button on his console, the robots stopped attacking for a moment and raised their arms in the air. “That should help.” Eggman said smugly.

Cream was stunned that even as big as she grew, she still wasn’t even close to even matching the robots, “I’ve got to get bigger!” She exclaimed to herself. But just as she was about to, the robots arms fired into the sky and a barrier appeared over the city. “Tails, they did something!”

“I know!” Tails tried to analyse the lasers above the city but the robots were already attacking, and Cream (though still small compared to the robots) was big enough at her current size, about up the robots knees, to be the primary target.

“Uh oh.” Cream gulped.

“Say farewell Cream the Rabbit, as strange as it is, you were my final true challenge, but in a moment that will be over too.” Eggman pressed a button, and the robots fired their lasers at the giant (though still much smaller) Cream, and Tails could no nothing but watch in horror as his girlfriend suddenly disappeared behind the glow of the lasers.

“CREAM!”
1123211211211121111112111211211122211221.title: Cream arrives to act as a BIG distraction

choices: Sonic and Shadow attempt to transform and fight the robots
1123211211211121111112111211211122211221.content:
Tails couldn’t breathe, in the span of a few moments, the best thing that had ever happened to him in his still all too short life had vanished behind a combined laser blast from all 3 robots. “Cream…”

“That does it,” Sonic growled and clenched his fists in anger. “Eggman’s just gone TOO FAR!” he glared determinedly in Shadow’s direction. “Let’s take ‘em out Shadow.”

“B-But…” Amy sniffled, after watching her best friend die at the hands of Eggman, she burst into tears as she mourned…she didn’t want to have to mourn for the love of her life too. “Sonic, they’ll kill YOU too! You heard what Shadow said, the second they notice you transforming they’ll attack! Please I can’t lose you too! I just can’t!”

She stopped her babbling when Sonic placed his hands on her shoulders. “Ames, I’ve got to.”

She looked into his eyes and was able to muster a very small and mournful smile even as tears streamed down her cheeks. “I know you do.”

With that done, Sonic turned around and nodded at Shadow. “Alright, let’s do this. For the world…and for Cream.”
1123211211211121111112111211211122211221.title: Sayonara, Cream the Rabbit

choices: They put their plan into action
1123211211211121111112111211211122211221.content:
“Did someone say my name?”

Everyone froze as they heard a familiar voice, including Tails who after hearing it had to suddenly swerve the plane out of the way of one of the robots to avoid crashing. “Am I hearing things?”

Standing there with a smile on her face and a little blue creature hovering next to her was none other than Cream the Rabbit. “I’m ok everyone! I’m getting REALLY good at changing my size! I just shrunk small enough that Dr. Eggman’s robots missed me!”

For a moment no one moved, until finally Amy whimpered and ran over at full speed to scoop up her little sister in a bone crushing hug. “Don’t you EVER scare me like that again!”

“Ok I’m sorry!” Cream gasped. “Amy you’re squishing me!”

“Sorry,” She loosened her hug and pulled her face back to look at the rabbit girl. “I was so worried, and I think Tails’ heart almost broke too.”

Cream frowned at that, “Oh no!” She pulled Amy’s wrist down to speak into the communicator there. “I’m ok Tails! Don’t be scared!”

“I’m ok now Cream,” he dodged another blast. “But these robots have almost completely destroyed Station Square and they aren’t stopping, we’re gonna need your help to stop them.”

“I’ll do anything I can!”

“Perfect, then here’s the plan!”
1123211211211121111112111211211122211221.title: Suddenly they hear a voice

choices: Cream is going to act as a distraction again
Cream is going to attack from the inside
1123211211211121111112111211211122211221.content:
"Alright Cream, you know what to do!”

Once again wearing the special ear piece that let her communicate with Tails, Cream shrunk down to a smaller size and snuck behind all the robots. “Ok, here I go!” Cream began growing fast, and in no time she was already back to the height she’d arrived at and surpassed it. As she grew the robots looked less and less intimidating, and she smiled as she saw she was starting to outgrow them, but then she let out a surprised yelp and immediately stopped growing when all of a sudden her head hit something. “Huh? I bumped my head!”

“That doesn’t make any sense! There’s nothing but air above her!” Knuckles exclaimed.

“Cream, get out of there!”
