Hearing Tails shout in her ear and noticing that the robots had once again spotted her, she closed her eyes and quickly shrank down to a size that would’ve made Cheese look like he was 200 feet tall. “Ok Tails, I think they can’t see me now.”

“Glad to see you’ve gotten used to shrinking too.”

“It’s still nowhere near as fun as growing.” Cream replied. “What happened?! I was about to be bigger than the robots and then I hit my head on something!”

“I’m running a scan now,” Tails analyzed the data coming in even as the robots turned their attention back to him. “Oh no, when those robots raised their arms, they activated an invisible force field that covers the whole city! Cream, Eggman’s found a way to make sure you can’t outgrow them!”

“So what should we do now?!”

“I suggest you try a different tactic.” Shadow spoke up.

“Got something in mind?” Sonic asked.

Shadow didn’t answer and instead spoke into his own communicator. “Cream, how fast can you change size?”

“Well, I’ve been getting a lot of practice Mr. Shadow, I can grow and shrink really fast now.”

“Then here’s what we’ll do.”
1123211211211121111112111211211122211221.title: So much for Plan A

choices: Time to clean up the mess
1123211211211121111112111211211122211221.content:
Moments later, Cream was once again hidden behind the robots. “Ok Mr. Shadow, I’m ready!”

“Good.” Shadow nodded and turned to Sonic. “If this works, Cream will take care of two of the robots for us, that leaves the last one to us.”

“I can’t believe you’re putting the fate of the world in the hands of a 6 year old girl.” Rouge scoffed, “She got lucky the first time but now she actually has to DO something.”

“She can handle it!” Tails exclaimed confidently. “Ok Cream, start growing!”

Cream focused hard, and she started shooting up like a weed, growing taller and taller until she was once again to the point where she hit her head on the force field. Only this time, she kept on growing and instead crouched down to make more room for her growing form. “How much bigger can I get?” She tried to say as quietly as possible so the robots didn’t hear her.

“Just a little more Cream, you’ll have to stop soon or you’ll be too big and start knocking down buildings!” Tails answered. He monitored her size carefully, and once she was so big that her back was hunched against the force field, he yelled. “Ok Cream, stop growing! Time for phase 2!”

Cream stopped growing, an uncharacteristic smirk on her face as she shouted as loud as she could and got the robots’ attention. “Dr. Eggman! Stop hurting all these people!”

The robots all immediately turned around, and Eggman was able to see her through the eyes of the robots. “Does she truly think she can challenge me? At that size she’s nothing more than a large target thanks to my brilliant planning.” The robots all turned to fire, and just as they were about to, Cream smirked again and shrunk down almost instantly to a tiny size. “What?! Where did she go?!” Eggman looked around the area using his robots, and moments later he spotted Cream again at that same enormous size, “Hold still you impudent child!”

She shrunk again just as the robots were about to fire, and she reappeared elsewhere giggling with amusement. “I may be only 6 years old, but I’m bigger than YOU’LL ever be!” She practically sang as she again repeated the process.

“She’s starting to love that line.” Tails chuckled. “Okay Sonic, Shadow, now would probably be a good time!”

“Got it Tails!” Sonic nodded at Shadow, who nodded back just as the Chaos Emeralds floated down and surrounded the two hedgehogs.

“Don’t get too used to that, I want those beauties back after you’re done!” Rouge exclaimed.

“Like they were ever yours.” Knuckles scoffed.

While Sonic and Shadow started their transformation, Cream was busy tormenting Eggman. “She’s really starting to test my patience!” Eggman then took full control of one of the robots and prepared to fire once more as Cream appeared right in front of them, perhaps even a little bit bigger than she’d been before. “I’m through being made for a fool!” Eggman fired for real this time, and his jaw dropped in shock when he saw that all he’d hit was one of his own robots. “WHAAAAAAAAAT?!”

“Yeah, it worked!” Knuckles pumped a fist.

“Have to admit, the kid’s doing a good job.” Rouge smiled and glanced over at Sonic and Shadow, who had their eyes closed and the Emeralds swirling around them at high speed. “Won’t be long now.”

But unfortunately, something was going wrong. “Doctor, a spike in chaos energy!” Orbot exclaimed.

“Yeah, and it looks like it’s coming from down there!” Cubot shouted.

“No!” Eggman didn’t bother to investigate, he had a feeling about what was coming. “All systems, full power!” He prepared to fire down to the ground. “There won’t be any super forms while I’M around!”

“No!” Desperate to help her friends, Cream shrank down just a little so she would have room to run. “Leave them alone!” She ran at full speed and tried to tackle the robot, and while it didn’t knock it over, the tackle did throw the beam off course…and it hit the other remaining robot. “Dr. Eggman, I won’t let you do this!’

Needless to say, Eggman was livid. “That does it, I have to take her out!” He lowered the robot’s arms and lowered the forcefield and hoped Cream wouldn’t notice, but if he was gonna wrestle with her, he needed the robot’s arms. “I hope you’re ready.”

“I’m always ready to help people!” Cream replied determinedly, “Like my friends always tell me, great power brings great responsibility!”

“Speaking of power.”

Eggman froze and turned the robot around, and he came face to face with Sonic and Shadow, both of them in their super forms. “Oh no.”

“Cream, hold him steady.” Sonic smirked.

The rabbit smiled and grew even more so that she was twice the size of the robot, and she picked it up and hugged it close with a breathless huff, “It’s still really heavy!”

“No problem.” Sonic grinned and glanced at Shadow. “Ready?”

“Ready.”

With that, the two hedgehogs burst through the robot’s armor and destroyed it from the inside, right after Cream dropped it to the ground. “We did it!” Cream cheered at the top of her lungs, “Now there’s only one thing left to do, we’ll have to help everyone fix Station Square!”
1123211211211121111112111211211122211221.title: Good thing there's always a Plan B

1123211211211121111112111211211122211221.content:
And so with the threat officially over, the group started work on cleaning up the city. Vanilla even stopped by after seeing her daughter had once again become instrumental in saving the world.

“I’m so proud of you Cream,” She said as she watched her gigantic daughter move piles of debris from one place to another. “But next time something like this happens, please don’t keep it a secret.”

“Ok mommy, I promise.” She smiled down at her tiny mother and tinier chao. “Ok, I’m done cleaning this, better see what’s next!”

And that’s what Cream did all day long. Using her great gift of size-changing, Cream was able to remove debris, hurry people to hospitals if they were hurt, and even give enormous hugs to people who were still scared and needed help to calm down, all in an 8th of the time it would take someone who was normal sized. “Tails gave me the greatest gift ever,” She thought to herself, “I’m helping people more than I ever could before, just like I always wanted.”

After the sun started to set, most of the clean up had been completed. There was still a lot of work to do with rebuilding, but that was another story. “Well, that was the fastest I’ve ever seen something like this go down, and if there’s any decent judge of fast, it’s me.” Sonic chuckled.

“We couldn’t have done it without Cream, she did most of the stuff that would’ve taken days in just a few minutes!” Amy exclaimed. “Hey, where is Cream anyway?”

“Over here.” Tails’ voice got their attention, and they turned around to see Cream laying in the street, dwarfing even the largest buildings as she’d apparently forgotten to shrink back down before falling asleep. “Looks like all this work tired her out.” Tails said softly.

“I don’t blame her, she did good today.” Sonic chuckled.

“Maybe one day she’ll be a G.U.N. special operative, they’re always looking for individuals with special talents like hers.” Rouge smirked.

“Since when do YOU recruit people?” Knuckles scowled. “She’s 6!”

“I said one day, not today.” Rouge rolled her eyes. “I had my doubts, but she sure stepped up when it counted.”

“Of course she did!” Amy beamed and looked back towards her gigantic friend. “She’s a hero too, at any size.”

“Agreed!” Tails exclaimed.

Vanilla smiled as well with a motherly loving expression on her face. “That’s my little girl.” She said lovingly.

Even in her sleep, the humongous little girl seemed to hear the praises she was receiving, as a small, content smile spread across her face as she peacefully rested after her big adventure.
1123211211211121111112111211211122211221.title: World's biggest helper

1123211211211121111112111211211122211221.content:
It was just another day for the inhabitants of a far off village in the middle of a small and often overlooked country of Othiepa. Little children littered the streets while adults did their best to try and carry on their daily routine as best as they could. Not knowing when or if their next meal would come.

With all the famines they suffered, hunger ran rampant across the country, and they lived in suffering every day. It wasn’t a good existence, but they fought on anyway, determined to face whatever life brought their way.

But they never could’ve expected what would happen today.

It was just another day, a lone mother worked hard on cleaning what little laundry they had there, when suddenly the water in her bucket rippled.

She thought nothing of it at first, but then it rippled again, and again, and each time it rippled it got more violent. She looked around and her eyes caught something in the distance, she dropped the laundry she was holding and her eyes widened in utter shock when she realized what she was looking at.

An enormous bunny was walking into the village with a huge white sack slung over her shoulder. “Hello!” She waved with a smile and continued on her way, and the stunned woman just watched, frozen as the rabbit made its way to the middle of the village.

By now the rabbit had attracted a crowd, and once it stopped, what appeared to be a fox appeared from the top of the rabbit’s head, and it flew down to the ground with a device in his hands. “Greetings people of Othiepa!” He said into his device which then translated into their language. “My name is Miles Prower, and the giant rabbit here holding the sack is my girlfriend Cream!”

“Hi everyone!” She waved with her free hand with a beaming smile.

Tails nodded and again addressed the crowd. “Before anyone freaks out, please know that we aren’t here to cause trouble, in fact, we came to help!”

“Help us with what? You are both outsiders!” The device translated an angry villager’s words for Tails. “Why is that rabbit so large, what witchcraft is this?!”

“I know this is unusual, but rest assured we ARE here to help you.” Tails nodded at Cream, and the enormous bunny gently placed the sack onto the ground and opened it up, revealing tons of fresh fruits and vegetables for the starving villagers. She scooped a very small handful out of the bag and placed the produce onto the ground. “All of this is for you!” Tails exclaimed.

Upon seeing the food, the villagers ran as fast as they could to start eating, not caring who got hurt since food was so rare that they took an every person for themselves thought process.

Luckily, a giant hand hit the ground and blocked the villagers from getting to the food. “Please wait everyone,” Cream said. “There’s no need to fight, in a moment EVERYONE will have MORE than enough to eat!’

“She’s right ya know!” Tails smiled and pulled out the device that was finally being used for what it was supposed to be used for. “This is the Growinator, it’s what made Cream here so big in the first place, and now it’s going to solve your food shortage!” Tails smiled and fired the beam at the food, and within moments all the fruits and vegetables began to enlarge substantially, he finally stopped when one of the apples was about as large as one of the villagers.

To emphasize the point that the food was safe, Cream took one of the enlarged carrots for herself and chewed it, smiling at everyone below the whole time. “Mmm, delicious!”

“And it’s all for you folks!” Tails shouted with enthusiasm. “So come one, come all, it’s an all you can eat buffet!”

One of the villagers came up to one of the giant apples and hesitantly took a bite, but as soon she tasted it, she cheered and began eating more, and before anyone knew it, everyone was eating like they’d never eaten before.

“Thank you fox! Thank you big bunny!” One of the young boys exclaimed as he chewed on a large chunk of apple.

“Oh you’re welcome, we’re glad you like it!” Cream smiled and watched from her high vantage point as all the hungry villagers got their fill of food, and there still even leftovers to boot. “Look at them all Tails, they’re so happy! This is the best thing I’ve ever seen!”

“Yeah, I guess.” He rubbed the back of his neck and blushed bashfully as he looked up at his giant girlfriend. “Hopefully we’ll be able to do this more, there are a lot of countries out there who could use food, and thanks to you, we can get anywhere to drop off enough so no one will ever go hungry again!”

“I’m just glad I can help.” Cream smiled with a gentle pink gracing her cheeks. “Being big is fun, but being able to help people makes it all worthwhile.”

“Well, we’ve still got a lot of ground to cover. Let’s get going.” Tails hopped back onto Cream’s head, and they spent most of the rest of the day visiting different areas and countries, giving them enough food so that everyone who was hungry would be able to eat, and then some.

“That’s all of it Tails.” Cream eventually said as she tried to empty the giant sack. “So when are we going to do this again?”

“Well we’ll have to start a food drive so we have food to give everyone. But that shouldn’t be hard. Then once we get some, you’ll grow again and we’ll go drop it off. I’ll make a schedule and everything.” Tails watched as Cream shrank down to normal and followed him into his workshop just as the sun was setting. “But for now, we can just have some fun. Any ideas?”

“Well…there is one thing…”
1123211211211121111112111211211122211221.title: Time to save the world again, in a new way

1123211211211121111112111211211122211221.content: How about that suggestion a while back about exploring the universe?
1123211211211121111112111211211122211221.title: Your choice

1123211211211121111112111211211122211221.content:
And so it was that Tails and Cheese followed Cream to a huge clearing in the middle of nowhere as they prepared for their recreational activities for the day. “You ready Cream?”

“Mhmm!” She nodded. “I’m so excited!”

“Ok.” Tails laughed and handed his girlfriend the earpiece used to communicate and also strapped a wireless camera on her shoulder. “That’s so I’ll be able to see everything from inside your pocket. You’ll be too big for me to see anything but fabric.”

Cream giggled at that. “I can’t wait to see what’s out there!”

“It should be fun. Ok Cream, grow.”

The girl began to rapidly increase in size, and once she was big enough, Tails hopped into her pocket with Cheese and activated the camera to watch the show. “We’re in Cream…let’s explore the universe!”

“Ok!” Cream’s growth rate quadrupled, and within minutes she was already too big for the planet and she needed to jump off. “I’m already so big…now let’s get even BIGGER!” And that was what she did for the next half hour, both she and Tails (who was safely nestled in her ever expanding pocket with Cheese) watched in awe as the Earth, the Sun and even the solar system itself began to shrink down to nothing compared to her, and she continued to grow and grow and grow as they began to explore the universe. “Well Tails, the solar system is too small for me to see now, wanna go exploring?”

“That’s what we’re here for.” Tails grinned, “With your size, we’ll get places in no time. I’ve already started making charts, and I’ve even taken the liberty of leaving a homing beacon so we can’t get lost. Grow as big as you want, all bets are off now.”
1123211211211121111112111211211122211221.title: Where no bunny has gone before

1123211211211121111112111211211122211221.content:
“Ok then!” And so Cream continued to grow and grow and grow, it was a feeling she’d never get tired of, and it made her feel amazing to think that she might become the biggest thing in the universe, and she’d get to see all of it with her beloved Tails and pet Cheese there with her. “Hey Tails, how big is the universe?”

“There’s no way to know for sure Cream.” He answered with a smirk.

“Well…I think we should find out!” And so Cream continued to grow even bigger, bigger than entire galaxies, which Cream stared at in wonder as they were so beautiful. She didn’t know how big she would finally end up getting, but it was nice to know that even if she somehow outgrew the universe itself, all she needed to do was go back and shrink back down and she’d be in her mother’s arms again.

Until then, she would keep growing and growing and growing, bigger than anything that ever existed, and she would get to witness firsthand the full majesty of the universe all at once, something that no one had ever or ever would experience. “This is the biggest adventure we’ll ever go on.”

“Somehow Cream,” Tails said. “Even if you outgrew the universe itself, I get the feeling that this is just the beginning.”

With that said, Cream was determined to test that theory. “Well there’s only one way to find out!” And with a big smile on her face, she kept on growing, and growing, and growing, and soon the whole universe would know the tender embrace of the adorable giant bunny, whose only goal in life now was to help people of all sizes, big or small. “Don’t worry anyone who might be out there, if you need help, I will come to help you! It’s my duty as a hero, and with my size, no job is too big, never again!”

And so she grew.
1123211211211121111112111211211122211221.title: Outgrow the universe and beyond

112321122.title: Cream grows in her sleep, the apple didn't ...

choices: Eggman gets there undetected, commence growth spurt
Eggman is spotted! Time to speed things up!
1123221.content:
Dr. Eggman put the finishing touches on his latest creation, a ray gun that could increase the size and change the nature of any target he desired. Surely, this would be the invention that would allow him to achieve world domination. "After all this time, I have finally come up with a foolproof plan to conquer the world!" the mad scientist cackled to himself as he raised the ray gun into the air in pride. "All I have to do is pick the perfect target to enlarge, and not only will Sonic and his miserable friends be powerless to stop me, but they won't even be willing out of concern of injuring their precious comrade!"

Then the genius stopped for a moment to stroke his mustache. "But who is that target?" He began to consider all the possibilities, listing them off in his head and eliminating them one by one.

Sonic himself would be too difficult to control, and he had too many people who would be willing to challenge him even at an enlarged size...the like of Shadow and Knuckles came to mind.

Speaking of whom, Shadow and Knuckles, also out of the question. Shadow would not stay under control either, and would probably not stop until there was nothing left to destroy...after all, it would be a lot more work to build Eggman Land from scratch instead of having something to work with...as for Knuckles, he wasn't smart enough. The ray would make him huge but useless.

Tails would keep Sonic at bay, but knowing how the fox boy worked, he would probably find a way to realize he'd been manipulated and would fight the control long enough to fix himself.

Amy...perhaps she would be a good candidate! She was fiery, already had violent tendencies, a bad temper...if she were made monstrous, surely she would...then again...Amy loved Sonic too much, she wouldn't use her size to destroy, at least not unless what she was destroying was getting in the way of her and Sonic.

"Rats, perhaps this won't be easy as I first thought."

Everyone that Eggman thought of had some reason why they wouldn't work...but then a lightbulb turned on inside his mind. "Of course! Why didn't I think of it sooner?!" And so, Eggman hopped into his Egg-Mobile, and headed over to the happy home of Cream the Rabbit, where his plan would soon come to fruition.
1123221.title: He's got the master plan

114.content: Who will grow to epic portion in this world of Mario?
114.title: Princess of mushroom growth?

121.content: So will it be Sora who shrinks? Riku? Or someone else?
121.title: Kingdom Hearts

1211.content:
For the first time in a very very long time Sora had been perfectly relaxed and safe, with no thoughts about possible Heartless or Nobody attacks; just having fun like a teenager should. Of course the possibility was there of an attack, but regardless Sora felt safe, currently he,Riku and Kairi were all resting on the beaches of Destiny Island.

Things were relatively normal within Karakura town, Substitute Shinigami Ichigo Kurosaki was currently with school along with his friends Uryu Ishida, Chad, Orihime, and Rukia. Renji, another of his friends was in town too, but currently at the Urahara shop being forced to do demeaning chores.

For the others they were all in their third class, all doing their various things. Ichigo was asleep, Uryu seemed not to care, Orihime paid the utmost attention, Chad was just...there, and Rukia was staring out the window bored.

This would've been how things remained for hours if not for the sudden beeping of Ichigo's Shinigami badge, repeatedly the small device screamed, "Hollow! Hollow!" To the point it infuriated the Shinigami. All hearing it, everyone leapt up and quickly ran out the door, Rukia being the last out said it was to the bathroom. Keigo Asano, a friend of Ichigo's tried to follow but was unfairly stopped by the teacher.

Getting out of the building everyone got ready for battle, Ichigo and Rukia switching to their Shinigami forms, Uryu making his bow appear,Chad transforming his arm, and Orihime's little allies circling her. Together the group soon reached a random area of town where a rather large hollow was wrecking the buildings around rather pointlessly.

"Damn that thing's as big as a menos!" Ichigo screamed, pulling out his blade Zangetsu.

Leaping beside Ichigo with his bow ready Uryu readied and arrow, "Good Ichigo, you've proven you can see."

Smirking the orange haired Shinigami nodded, "Don't make me turn the blade on you."

"I hate Shinigami remember?" Uryu smirked too.

Together the two attacked, Uryu providing rear support and Ichigo running towards him for close combat. Close behind him were Rukia and Chad, Orihime stayed back to provide rear support like Uryu.

Quickly reaching the hollow Ichigo pulled his sword over his head, "Getsuga Tenshou!" Swinging the weapon down a large beam of energy escaped from the blade, creating a good sized explosion on contact. Soon the smoke cleared revealing the hollow, apparently unharmed.

"What?" Ichigo blurted in shock before the hollow struck him, sending him flying back about twenty feet.

"Idiot" Rukia muttered, using a Shunpo to get behind the hollow. With Chad about to attack up front and Rukia behind she released her sword.

"Sode No Shira Yuki!" Instantly the silver blade turned into a pure white blade of beauty. Using her blade Rukia leapt and stroke the hollow through the torso, actually slicing it in half on contact.

The large, almost hundred foot tall hollow roared in pain, actually getting smaller as he did so. Soon the hollow was no more than a foot tall where it finally died and vanished.

"Ichigo had trouble beating that?" Rukia asked aloud in disappointment.

An eerie voice played itself, "The one who slays me gains my power, that is the rule of the Gigantes." Gasping Rukia recognized the voice belonging to the hollow.

Next to Rukia was Ichigo, who apparently just made it back "Something wrong Rukia?"

"You.....didn't hear that?"

"Hear what?"

"Nevermind."

135211.content:
Hot, dry, and exhausting. Those were the three words that best described the land; an expanse of desert lay in every direction, far beyond that which the eye could see, with not so much as a road or tree in sight. It is in this barren land of sand and sun that we begin our tale with the beautiful young Egyptologist, Professor Anzu Mazaki.

Despite being in her early twenties, Professor Mazaki had already become one of the field's most renowned experts, as many of the more seasoned members of the study often joked, "If I didn't know any better, I'd say she experienced it first hand!". However, this was not a typical expedition. No...This was a return to a site she knew intimately. She came bearing flowers, as though to lie on a grave.

Her eyes showing traces of sadness, Anzu walked over to one of the larger pyramids at the archaeological site around her. The pyramid she stood in front of was not just any pyramid; no, it was the very pyramid where she had said farewell to a very dear friend.

"Atem," she muttered with slight traces of tears at the edge of her eyes.

Once the wind subsided, Anzu slowly opened her eyes again and started to let her mind wander about Atem once more. Her eyes carelessly scanning the horizon, Anzu soon found herself looking at a sort of gold and blue colored rod sticking out of the sand; it seems the recent winds had unearthed it. Anzu approached the staff as if a feeling of deja vu overcame her. Memories came flooding back to her as she realized what it was: memories both joyful and bittersweet as she recalled her adventures with her friends. She wiped away tears from her eyes as she went to dig the staff out with her bare hands.

She chuckled and cried at the same time as she held it in her hands. "Mana...Wherever you are, I'm sure that you're keeping each other safe."

Opening the box that held the artifact, which was no bigger than one meant to hold an engagement ring, she sees an oval jewel of sapphire colour and on topof the box there was a small note that read:

"Whosoever consumes the Heart of Eternal Enhancement

Swallowing it, as stated by the poem, she could feel how the gem slowly made its way through her body where her heart was.As soon as it reached there, she felt pain the likes of which she has never felt before. She also noticed that her attributes weren't heavy at all, in fact she felt lighter than ever before. Standing before her father, she said:"You have taken from me what I cherished the most, prepare for a merciless beating." This in turn only got a mocking laugh from him,"My,my, it has been a while, Raven. Looks while you've developed into a woman I never thought you were capable of, oh well, more flesh for me to devour. Now come, be a good little girl and feed your daddy for all time sakes."

"Wrong choice of words, old goat - ETERNIA XESIUM NEVAR!" She then rubbed her foot on the ground, twisting it again and again until his remains would be burned by the friction she made.

With Trigun now defeated once and for all, she truned her attention to the now desolate planet, saying that with her friends gone, the Universe has no meaning and if the Universe has no meaning than what's the point of it even existing. Since there was no turning back for her now, why not use her powers to punish the Universe since it dared to mock her friends' efforts by simply existing.

She would chant the words that will help her for this great cause:"ETERNIA XESIUM NEVAR". The effects were instant. In a matter of seconds, her size grew so big, the Earth looked like the size of a pea. In order to her to finally detach herself from the pain, she immediately consumed everything that reminded her of the tragic event,starting with the planet she came from,then the entire Solar System and now she needed to consume everything else. The Milky Way was next to go,then other galaxies,before Raven could even blink the entire Universe was now consumed by her and she was still growing. Is this enough? NOT BY A LONG SHOT. Raven is still far from satisfied,so she continues growing, continuously seeking for anything to consume and avenge her friends even further. But was this what Raven really wanted or was it what the jewel wanted her to think?

Who knows?
